disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire={
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.1
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.1.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.1.D
		picture=BAD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-4
			add_legitimacy=-30
			set_country_flag=had_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.2
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.2.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.2.OPT1
	
			add_stability=1
			add_adm_power=200
			add_mil_power=100
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.3
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.3.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.3.D
		picture=LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.3.OPT1
	
			add_disaster_modifier={
				name=fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire_weakened_army
				duration=-1
				disaster=fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.4
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.4.D
		picture=ANGRY_MOB_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						culture=panjabi
					}
					save_event_target_as=sikh_rebel_province
				}
			}
		}
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.4.OPT1
	
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_brahmins
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_brahmins
					loyalty=-10
				}
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_1={
				hinduism_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				hinduism_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_3={
				hinduism_rebels=3
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_saved_event_target=sikh_rebel_province
				}
				event_target_sikh_rebel_province={
					sikhism_rebels=3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.5
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.5.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.5.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.5.OPT1
	
			add_army_tradition=-15
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_rajput
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_rajput
					loyalty=-10
				}
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_nobles
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_nobles
					loyalty=-10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.6
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.6.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.6.D
		picture=OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.6.OPT1
	
			add_disaster_modifier={
				name=fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire_mughal_economic_collapse
				duration=-1
				disaster=fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.7
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.7.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.7.D
		picture=ANGRY_MOB_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.7.OPT1
	
			event_target_rebel_province_1={
				anti_tax_rebels=2
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				anti_tax_rebels=2
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_3={
				anti_tax_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.8
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.8.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.8.D
		picture=CORRUPTION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.8.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_jains
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_jains
					loyalty=10
				}
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_burghers
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_burghers
					loyalty=10
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.8.OPT2
	
			add_stability=-1
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_jains
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_jains
					loyalty=-10
				}
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_burghers
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_burghers
					loyalty=-10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.9
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.9.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.9.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.9.OPT1
	
			add_disaster_modifier={
				name=fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire_unpaid_army
				duration=-1
				disaster=fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.10
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.10.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.10.D
		picture=BAD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.10.OPT1
	
			add_mil_power=-100
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.11
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.11.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.11.D
		picture=REVOLUTION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			NOT={exists=RJP}
			num_of_owned_provinces_with={
				value=10
				culture=rajput
				is_capital=no
				controlled_by=REB
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						culture=rajput
						is_capital=no
						controlled_by=REB
					}
					add_core=RJP
					clear_rebels=yes
				}
				capital_scope={
					if={
						limit={
							is_core=RJP
						}
						remove_core=RJP
					}
				}
				release=RJP
				vassalize=RJP
				RJP={
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.7
							artillery=0.3
						}
					}
					add_treasury=1000
					add_manpower=2
					add_years_of_income=15
					add_yearly_manpower=15
					change_government=monarchy
					adopt_reform_progress=ROOT
					capital_scope={
						PREV={change_religion=PREV}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.11.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-1
			RJP={
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=ROOT
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.12
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.12.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.12.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			religion_group=muslim
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.12.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_church
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_church
					loyalty=-15
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_brahmins
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_brahmins
					loyalty=15
				}
			}
			capital_scope={
				sunni_rebels=3
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.12.OPT2
	
			add_stability=-1
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_church
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_church
					loyalty=10
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_brahmins
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_brahmins
					loyalty=-15
				}
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_1={
				particularist_rebels=2
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				particularist_rebels=2
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_3={
				particularist_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.13
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.13.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.13.D
		picture=ANGRY_MOB_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.13.OPT1
	
			event_target_rebel_province_1={
				noble_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				noble_rebels=3
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.14
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.14.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.14.D
		picture=BAD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.14.OPT1
	
			capital_scope={
				pretender_rebels=3
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.15
		title=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.15.T
		desc=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.15.D
		picture=CORRUPTION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_crisis_of_the_mughal_empire.15.OPT1
	
			add_corruption=2
		}
	}
}
disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans={
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.1
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.1.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.1.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=had_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-3
			add_corruption=5
			every_owned_province={
				limit={
					OR={
						area=delta_area
						area=al_wahat_area
						area=bahari_area
						area=gulf_of_arabia_area
					}
				}
				add_local_autonomy=25
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.2
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.2.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.2.OPT1
	
			if={
				limit={
					ADM=6
				}
				add_adm_power=200
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					ADM=5
				}
				change_adm=1
				add_adm_power=100
			}
			else={
				change_adm=2
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_tanzimat
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.3
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.3.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.3.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.3.OPT1
	
			add_inflation=3
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.4
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.4.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.4.OPT1
	
			add_disaster_modifier={
				name=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_illiterate
				duration=10950
				disaster=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.5
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.5.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.5.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						region=anatolia_region
						base_tax=2
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_2
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_2
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_3
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_3
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_4
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_4
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_4}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_4}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_5
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_province_5
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_4}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_5}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=anatolia_region
							base_tax=2
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_4}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_5}

	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.9
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.9.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.9.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							OR={
								has_owner_culture=yes
								culture=turkish
							}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								has_owner_culture=yes
								culture=turkish
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_shiite
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						save_event_target_as=target_shiite
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							is_capital=no
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							is_capital=no
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_peasants_1
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						save_event_target_as=target_peasants_1
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							is_capital=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_peasants_1}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							is_capital=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_peasants_1}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_peasants_2
					}
				}
				else={

						save_event_target_as=target_peasants_2
					}
				}

							is_capital=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_peasants_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_peasants_2}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							is_capital=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_peasants_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_peasants_2}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_peasants_3
					}
				}
				else={

					}
				}

					save_event_target_as=target_particularists_1
				}
				if={

							is_capital=no

					}
				}

							is_capital=no
						}

					}
				}

					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							is_capital=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_1}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							is_capital=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_1}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_2
					}
				}
				else={

						save_event_target_as=target_2
					}
				}
			}
		}

			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.10.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=0.25}
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_inflation=3

				limit={
					has_estate=estate_burghers
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_burghers
					loyalty=-10
				}
			}

			add_stability=-1

				name=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_starving_poor
				duration=9125
				disaster=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans
			}

				anti_tax_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_target_2={
				anti_tax_rebels=3
			}
			capital_scope={
				anti_tax_rebels=3
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.10.OPT3
	
			highlight=yes
	
			trigger={
				OR={
					ruler_has_personality=kind_hearted_personality

			}

			add_stability=1

		}

		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.13.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_balkan_separatism
			NOT={culture_group=carpathian}
			carpathia_region={
				owned_by=ROOT
				culture_group=carpathian
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						culture_group=carpathian
						region=carpathia_region
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							culture_group=carpathian
							region=carpathia_region
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_1}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							culture_group=carpathian
							region=carpathia_region
							NOT={province_id=event_target_target_1}
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_2
					}
				}
				else={

						limit={
							culture_group=carpathian
							region=carpathia_region
						}
						save_event_target_as=target_2
					}
				}
			}

	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.18
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.18.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.18.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_balkan_separatism
			NOT={exists=SER}
			num_of_owned_provinces_with={
				value=3
				OR={
					area=serbia_area
					area=rascia_area
				}
			}
			num_of_owned_provinces_with={
				value=10
				region=balkan_region
				controlled_by=REB
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						OR={
							area=serbia_area
							area=rascia_area
							culture=serbian
						}
					}
					add_core=SER
					change_culture=serbian
					kill_units={
						who=REB
					}
					change_controller=ROOT
				}
				release=SER
				vassalize=SER
				SER={
					change_religion=orthodox
					change_primary_culture=serbian
					change_government=republic
					adopt_reform_progress=ROOT
					every_owned_province={
						set_local_autonomy=0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.18.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-1
			tooltip={create_vassal=SER}
			SER={
				hidden_effect={
					add_yearly_manpower=15
					add_years_of_income=15
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.7
							artillery=0.3
						}
					}
					add_casus_belli={
						target=ROOT
						type=cb_independence_war
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=ROOT
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				every_country={
					limit={
						religion=orthodox
						total_development=100
						OR={
							culture_group=east_slavic
							culture_group=west_slavic
							culture_group=south_slavic
						}
					}

						id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.26
						days=2
						random=3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				add_local_autonomy=25
			}
			event_target_target_4={
				add_local_autonomy=25
			}
			event_target_target_5={
				add_local_autonomy=25
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.22.OPT2
	
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_nobles
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_nobles
					loyalty=-15
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_church
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_church
					loyalty=-15
				}
			}
			event_target_target_1={
				noble_rebels=1
			}
			event_target_target_2={
				noble_rebels=1
			}
			event_target_target_3={
				noble_rebels=1
			}
			event_target_target_4={
				sunni_rebels=1
			}
			event_target_target_5={
				sunni_rebels=1
			}
			event_target_target_6={
				sunni_rebels=1
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.23
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.23.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.23.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_balkan_separatism
			balkan_region={
				owned_by=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.23.OPT1
	
			balkan_region={
				limit={
					owned_by=ROOT
				}
				add_devastation=8
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_hayduks
					duration=18250
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.24
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.24.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.24.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_global_flag=greek_cores
			NOT={exists=GRE}
			num_of_owned_provinces_with={
				value=6
				culture=greek
				controlled_by=REB
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						culture=greek
					}
					add_core=GRE
					kill_units={
						who=REB
					}
					change_controller=ROOT
				}
				release=GRE
				vassalize=GRE
				GRE={
					change_religion=orthodox
					change_primary_culture=greek
					change_government=republic
					add_government_reform=merchants_reform
					adopt_reform_progress=ROOT
					define_ruler={
						name="Ioannis Kapodistrias"
						adm=5
						dip=5
						mil=2
						claim=50
					}
					if={
						limit={
							has_dlc="Rights of Man"
						}
						add_ruler_personality=lawgiver_personality
					}
					define_general={
						name="Theodores Koloktronis"
						shock=4
						fire=3
						manuever=6
						siege=1
					}
					define_admiral={
						name="Andreas Miaoulis"
						shock=3
						fire=3
						manuever=5
						siege=0
					}
					add_country_modifier={
						name=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_greek_freedom_fighters
						duration=5475
					}
					every_owned_province={
						set_local_autonomy=0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.24.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-1
			tooltip={create_vassal=GRE}
			GRE={
				hidden_effect={
					add_yearly_manpower=15
					add_years_of_income=15
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.7
							artillery=0.3
						}
					}
					add_casus_belli={
						target=ROOT
						type=cb_independence_war
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=ROOT
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
				}
			}
			every_enemy_country={
				country_event={id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.25 days=2}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.25
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.25.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.25.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			tag=GRE
		}
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.25.OPT1
	
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=GRE
				modifier=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_greece_opinion
			}
			create_alliance=GRE
			join_all_offensive_wars_of=GRE
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.25.OPT2
	
			add_prestige=-10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.26
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.26.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.26.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			tag=TUR
		}
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.26.OPT1
	
			create_alliance=SER
			join_all_offensive_wars_of=SER
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=SER
				modifier=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_aided_us_opinion
			}
			add_opinion={
				who=SER
				modifier=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_aided_us_opinion
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.26.OPT2
	
			add_treasury=-500
			add_manpower=-15
			SER={
				add_treasury=500
				add_manpower=15
			}
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=SER
				modifier=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_sent_aid_opinion
			}
			add_opinion={
				who=SER
				modifier=fee_decline_of_the_ottomans_sent_aid_opinion
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.26.OPT3
	
			add_prestige=-10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.27
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.27.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.27.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			corruption=2
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.27.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
			add_adm_power=-100
			add_corruption=-2
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.27.OPT2
	
			add_adm_power=50
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.28
		title=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.28.T
		desc=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.28.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			NOT={exists=EGY}
			owns_core_province=361
			owns_core_province=358
			num_of_owned_provinces_with={
				value=10
				region=egypt_region
				is_core=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						culture=al_misr_arabic
					}
					add_core=EGY
					kill_units={
						who=REB
					}
					change_controller=ROOT
				}
				release=EGY
				vassalize=EGY
				EGY={
					change_religion=sunni
					change_primary_culture=al_misr_arabic
					change_government=monarchy
					add_government_reform=mamluk_government
					adopt_reform_progress=ROOT
					add_adm_power=100
					add_dip_power=100
					add_mil_power=100
					every_owned_province={
						set_local_autonomy=0
					}
					add_casus_belli={
						target=ROOT
						type=cb_independence_war
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.28.OPT1
	
			create_march=EGY
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={stability=-2}
				}
				add_stability=-2
			}
			else={
				add_adm_power=-200
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_decline_of_the_ottomans.28.OPT2
	
			EGY={
				hidden_effect={
					add_years_of_income=15
					add_yearly_manpower=15
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.50
							cavalry=0.20
							artillery=0.30
						}
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb={
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
					who=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy={
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.1
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.1.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.1.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=had_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy
				set_country_flag=hab_division_1
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_legitimacy=-50
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.2
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.2.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.2.OPT1
	
			add_stability=2
			change_government_reform_progress=100
			add_adm_power=100
			add_dip_power=100
			if={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=military_reunification
				}
				if={
					limit={
						has_reform=feudalism_reform
					}
					remove_government_reform=feudalism_reform
				}
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy_new_habsburg_monarchy
					duration=-1
				}
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=diplomatic_reunification
				}
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy_restored_habsburg_monarchy
					duration=-1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=hab_division_1
				clr_country_flag=hab_division_2
				clr_country_flag=hab_division_3
				clr_country_flag=hab_division_4
				clr_country_flag=military_reunification
				clr_country_flag=diplomatic_reunification
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.3
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.3.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.3.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=HAB
				was_tag=HAB
			}
			has_disaster=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy
			has_country_flag=hab_division_1
			NOT={exists=STY}
			inner_austria_area={
				owned_by=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=6
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				inner_austria_area={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					remove_core=ROOT
					add_core=STY
					if={
						limit={
							units_in_province=REB
						}
						kill_units={
							who=REB
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={area=inner_austria_area}
						is_core=STY
					}
					set_province_flag=was_core_of_STY
					remove_core=STY
				}
				release=STY
				vassalize=STY
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_province_flag=was_core_of_STY
					}
					clr_province_flag=was_core_of_STY
					add_core=STY
				}
				STY={
					change_government=monarchy
					add_government_reform=feudalism_reform
					adopt_reform_progress=ROOT
					change_religion=new_variable_dominant_religion
					change_primary_culture=new_variable_dominant_culture
					define_ruler={
						claim=75
						dynasty="von Habsburg"
					}
					set_prestige_to_zero=yes
					add_years_of_income=15
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={treasury=1000}
						}
						add_treasury=1000
					}
					add_yearly_manpower=15
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={manpower=5}
						}
						add_manpower=5
					}
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.7
							cavalry=0.2
							artillery=0.1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.3.OPT1
	
			tooltip={
				STY={
					custom_tooltip=FEE_DIVISION_OF_THE_HABSBURG_MONARCHY_THIS_IS_RELEASED_AS_FREE_TT
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				STY={
					grant_independence=yes
				}
				if={
					limit={
						hre_size=1
						is_emperor=yes
						NOT={hre_reform_passed=emperor_erbkaisertum}
						NOT={hre_reform_passed=erbkaisertum}
						calc_true_if={
							all_elector={
								NOT={tag=ROOT}
							}
							amount=1
						}
					}
					set_country_flag=electors_can_decide_STY_for_emperor
					every_elector={
						limit={
							NOT={tag=ROOT}
						}
						country_event={id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.4 days=1}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.3.OPT2
	
			add_stability=-1
			tooltip={
				STY={
					custom_tooltip=FEE_DIVISION_OF_THE_HABSBURG_MONARCHY_THIS_IS_RELEASED_AS_VASSAL_TT
				}
			}
			STY={
				hidden_effect={
					add_casus_belli={
						target=ROOT
						type=cb_independence_war
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=ROOT
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						hre_size=1
						is_emperor=yes
						NOT={hre_reform_passed=emperor_erbkaisertum}
						NOT={hre_reform_passed=erbkaisertum}
						calc_true_if={
							all_elector={
								NOT={tag=ROOT}
							}
							amount=1
						}
					}
					set_country_flag=electors_can_decide_STY_for_emperor
					every_elector={
						limit={
							NOT={tag=ROOT}
						}
						country_event={id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.4 days=1}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			set_country_flag=hab_division_2
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.4
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.4.D
		picture=HRE_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			is_emperor=yes
		}
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=elector_can_back_STY_for_emperor
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.4.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=0.4
				modifier={
					factor=100
					is_rival=FROM
				}
				modifier={
					factor=2
					NOT={
						has_opinion={
							who=FROM
							value=0
						}
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=0
					OR={
						alliance_with=FROM
						AND={
							is_subject_of=FROM
							NOT={liberty_desire=50}
						}
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=2
					is_subject_of=FROM
					liberty_desire=50
				}
				modifier={
					factor=3
					is_subject_of=FROM
					liberty_desire=75
				}
				modifier={
					factor=5
					is_subject_of=FROM
					liberty_desire=95
				}
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					is_subject=no
				}
				create_alliance=STY
				if={
					limit={
						government=monarchy
						religion_group=STY
					}
					create_marriage=STY
				}
				if={
					limit={
						STY={
							is_in_war={
								attacker_leader=THIS
								defender_leader=FROM
								casus_belli=cb_independence_war
							}
						}
					}
					join_all_offensive_wars_of=STY
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip=FEE_DIVISION_OF_THE_HABSBURG_MONARCHY_ELECTOR_BACKS_STY_FOR_EMPEROR_TT
			set_country_flag=elector_backs_STY_for_emperor
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.4.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=0.6
				modifier={
					factor=0
					is_rival=FROM
				}
				modifier={
					factor=0.5
					NOT={
						has_opinion={
							who=FROM
							value=0
						}
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=100
					OR={
						alliance_with=FROM
						AND={
							is_subject_of=FROM
							NOT={liberty_desire=50}
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	
		after={
			set_country_flag=elector_decided_about_STY_for_emperor
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.5
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.5.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.5.D
		picture=HRE_eventPicture
	
		hidden=yes
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=HAB
				was_tag=HAB
			}
			has_country_flag=electors_can_decide_STY_for_emperor
			all_elector={
				OR={
					NOT={has_country_flag=elector_can_back_STY_for_emperor}
					has_country_flag=elector_decided_about_STY_for_emperor
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						is_emperor=yes
						calc_true_if={
							all_elector={
								has_country_flag=elector_backs_STY_for_emperor
							}
							amount=4
						}
						STY={
							religion_group=christian
							has_regency=no
							government=monarchy
						}
						OR={
							NOT={has_dlc="Art of War"}
							AND={
								has_dlc="Art of War"
								OR={
									STY={religion=ROOT}
									hre_religion_treaty=yes
								}
							}
						}
					}
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.6}
				}
				clr_country_flag=electors_can_decide_STY_for_emperor
				every_country={
					clr_country_flag=elector_can_back_STY_for_emperor
					clr_country_flag=elector_decided_about_STY_for_emperor
					clr_country_flag=elector_backs_STY_for_emperor
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.5.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.6
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.6.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.6.D
		picture=HRE_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.6.OPT1
	
			tooltip={
				set_emperor=no
			}
			custom_tooltip=FEE_DIVISION_OF_THE_HABSBURG_MONARCHY_STY_BECOMES_EMPEROR_TT
			hidden_effect={
				STY={
					set_emperor=yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.7
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.7.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.7.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=HAB
				was_tag=HAB
			}
			has_disaster=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy
			has_country_flag=hab_division_2
			NOT={exists=TIR}
			tirol_area={
				owned_by=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=6
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				tirol_area={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					remove_core=ROOT
					add_core=TIR
					if={
						limit={
							units_in_province=REB
						}
						kill_units={
							who=REB
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={area=tirol_area}
						is_core=TIR
					}
					set_province_flag=was_core_of_TIR
					remove_core=TIR
				}
				release=TIR
				vassalize=TIR
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_province_flag=was_core_of_TIR
					}
					clr_province_flag=was_core_of_TIR
					add_core=TIR
				}
				TIR={
					change_government=monarchy
					add_government_reform=feudalism_reform
					adopt_reform_progress=ROOT
					change_religion=new_variable_dominant_religion
					change_primary_culture=new_variable_dominant_culture
					define_ruler={
						claim=75
						dynasty="von Habsburg"
					}
					set_prestige_to_zero=yes
					add_years_of_income=15
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={treasury=1000}
						}
						add_treasury=1000
					}
					add_yearly_manpower=15
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={manpower=5}
						}
						add_manpower=5
					}
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.7
							cavalry=0.2
							artillery=0.1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.7.OPT1
	
			tooltip={
				TIR={
					custom_tooltip=FEE_DIVISION_OF_THE_HABSBURG_MONARCHY_THIS_IS_RELEASED_AS_FREE_TT
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				TIR={
					grant_independence=yes
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.7.OPT2
	
			add_stability=-1
			tooltip={
				TIR={
					custom_tooltip=FEE_DIVISION_OF_THE_HABSBURG_MONARCHY_THIS_IS_RELEASED_AS_VASSAL_TT
				}
			}
			TIR={
				hidden_effect={
					add_casus_belli={
						target=ROOT
						type=cb_independence_war
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=ROOT
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip=FEE_DIVISION_OF_THE_HABSBURG_MONARCHY_RIVALS_MAY_JOIN_VASSAL_IN_WAR_TT
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						any_rival_country={
							NOT={war_with=ROOT}
						}
					}
					TIR={
						save_event_target_as=vassal_to_support
					}
					every_rival_country={
						limit={
							NOT={war_with=ROOT}
						}
						country_event={id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.26}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			set_country_flag=hab_division_3
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.8
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.8.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.8.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=HAB
				was_tag=HAB
			}
			has_disaster=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy
			has_country_flag=hab_division_3
			exists=HUN
			overlord_of=HUN
			HUN={
				OR={
					junior_union_with=ROOT
					AND={
						is_expanded_mod_active={mod=subjects}
						is_subject_of_type=brother_kingdom
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=2
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.8.OPT1
	
			tooltip={
				HUN={
					grant_independence=yes
					add_truce_with=ROOT
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				HUN={
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.9}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.8.OPT2
	
			add_legitimacy=-20
			HUN={
				add_liberty_desire=75
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.9
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.9.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.9.D

		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.9.OPT1
	
			add_truce_with=FROM
			tooltip={
				grant_independence=yes
			}
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						is_lesser_in_union=yes
					}
					break_union=yes
				}
				else={
					overlord={
						ROOT={
							grant_independence=yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			define_ruler={
				name="Maximilian"
				dynasty="von Habsburg"
				age=16
				claim=50
				adm=2
				dip=4
				mil=4
			}
			hidden_effect={
				kill_heir={allow_new_heir=no}
			}
		}
	}

					change_government=monarchy
					add_government_reform=feudalism_reform
					adopt_reform_progress=ROOT

					casus_belli=cb_independence_war

			hidden_effect={

					limit={
						any_country={
							is_subject=no
							NOT={war_with=ROOT}
							NOT={alliance_with=ROOT}
							NOT={alliance_with=SWA}
							capital_scope={
								region=south_german_region
							}
						}
					}
					SWA={
						save_event_target_as=vassal_to_support
					}
					every_country={
						limit={
							is_subject=no
							NOT={war_with=ROOT}
							NOT={alliance_with=ROOT}
							NOT={alliance_with=SWA}
							capital_scope={
								region=south_german_region
							}
						}

					}
				}
			}

			set_country_flag=hab_division_4
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.13
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.13.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.13.D

			OR={

				was_tag=HAB

			has_country_flag=hab_division_4
			is_at_war=no

			months=12
		}

			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.13.OPT1

				name=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy_diplomatic_efforts
				duration=27375
			}
			set_country_flag=diplomatic_reunification
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.13.OPT2
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy_reunification_wars
				duration=1825
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=STY
					NOT={overlord_of=STY}
				}
				add_casus_belli={
					target=STY
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=TIR
					NOT={overlord_of=TIR}
				}
				add_casus_belli={
					target=TIR
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=HUN
					NOT={overlord_of=HUN}
				}
				add_casus_belli={
					target=HUN
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=BOH
					NOT={overlord_of=BOH}
				}
				add_casus_belli={
					target=BOH
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=SWA
					NOT={overlord_of=SWA}
				}
				add_casus_belli={
					target=SWA
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
				}
			}
			set_country_flag=military_reunification
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.14
		title=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.14.T
		desc=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.14.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.14.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=0.5
				modifier={
					factor=0.5
					army_strength={who=FROM value=2}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=2
					NOT={army_strength={who=FROM value=0.5}}
				}
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					OR={
						is_subject_of=FROM
						tag=STY
						tag=TIR
						tag=SWA
					}
				}
				tooltip={
					FROM={
						inherit=ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				tooltip={
					FROM={
						create_union=ROOT
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=FROM
						modifier=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy_acceptance
					}
					reverse_add_opinion={
						who=FROM
						modifier=fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy_acceptance
					}
					add_liberty_desire=-30
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				FROM={
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.15 days=3}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.14.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=0.5
				modifier={
					factor=2
					army_strength={who=FROM value=2}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=0.5
					NOT={army_strength={who=FROM value=0.5}}
				}
			}
	
			tooltip={
				FROM={
					add_casus_belli={
						target=ROOT
						type=cb_restore_personal_union
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						OR={
							tag=STY
							tag=TIR
						}
					}
					every_owned_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								culture=FROM
								culture=austrian
							}
						}
						add_core=FROM
					}
				}
				else={
					FROM={
						add_dip_power=100
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				FROM={
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_division_of_the_habsburg_monarchy.16 days=3}
				}
			}
		}
	}

disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter={
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.2
		title=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.2.T
		desc=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=ita_republican_matter
				set_country_flag=fee_ita_republican_matter_subversed
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.2.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=0.40}
	
			change_government_to_republic=yes
			if={
				limit={
					is_expanded_mod_active={mod=governments}
				}
				add_government_reform=constitutional_republic_reform
			}
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={has_parliament=yes}
				}
				add_government_reform=parliamentary_reform
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.2.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={factor=0.40}
	
			change_government_to_monarchy=yes
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={has_parliament=yes}
				}
				add_government_reform=parliamentary_reform
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.2.OPT3
	
			ai_chance={factor=0.20}
	
			add_stability=-1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.1
		title=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.1.T
		desc=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.1.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_prestige=-20
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-20 republican_tradition=-10}
	
			custom_tooltip=ITA_REPUBLICAN_MATTER_TT
			set_country_flag=ita_republican_matter
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.3
		title=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.3.T
		desc=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.3.D
		picture=DEBATE_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				NOT={government=republic}
				AND={
					government=republic
					NOT={has_reform=constitutional_republic_reform}
				}
			}
			italy_region={
				owned_by=ROOT
				NOT={area=western_sicily_area}
				NOT={area=sicily_area}
				NOT={area=calabria_area}
				NOT={area=apulia_area}
				NOT={area=naples_area}
				NOT={area=lazio_area}
				NOT={area=corsica_sardinia_area}
				NOT={area=central_italy_area}
				NOT={has_province_flag=ita_republican_rebellion_3}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.3.OPT1
	
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					region=italy_region
					NOT={area=western_sicily_area}
					NOT={area=sicily_area}
					NOT={area=calabria_area}
					NOT={area=apulia_area}
					NOT={area=naples_area}
					NOT={area=lazio_area}
					NOT={area=corsica_sardinia_area}
					NOT={area=central_italy_area}
				}
				hidden_effect={
					set_province_flag=ita_republican_rebellion_3
				}
				if={
					limit={
						owner={government=republic}
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						size=2
						type=ita_republican_rebels
					}
				}
				else={
					spawn_rebels={
						size=3
						type=ita_republican_rebels
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.4
		title=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.4.D
		picture=DEBATE_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				NOT={government=monarchy}
				AND={
					government=monarchy
					NOT={has_parliament=yes}
				}
			}
			italy_region={
				owned_by=ROOT
				OR={
					area=western_sicily_area
					area=sicily_area
					area=calabria_area
					area=apulia_area
					area=naples_area
					area=lazio_area
					area=corsica_sardinia_area
					area=central_italy_area
				}
				NOT={has_province_flag=ita_monarchy_rebellion_3}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_italy_republican_matter.4.OPT1
	
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					region=italy_region
					OR={
						area=western_sicily_area
						area=sicily_area
						area=calabria_area
						area=apulia_area
						area=naples_area
						area=lazio_area
						area=corsica_sardinia_area
						area=central_italy_area
					}
					NOT={has_province_flag=ita_monarchy_rebellion_3}
				}
				hidden_effect={
					set_province_flag=ita_monarchy_rebellion_3
				}
				if={
					limit={
						owner={government=monarchy}
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						size=2
						type=ita_monarchy_rebels
					}
				}
				else={
					spawn_rebels={
						size=3
						type=ita_monarchy_rebels
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		desc=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.3.D
		picture=LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes

		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.3.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-2
			add_prestige=-20
			kill_ruler=yes
			kill_advisor_by_category_effect={ADM=yes}

			kill_advisor_by_category_effect={MIL=yes}
			capital_scope={
				leadered_peasant_rebels=1
			}
			every_neighbor_country={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_disaster_netherlands_cannibals
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.4
		title=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.4.D
		picture=ANGRY_MOB_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={is_state=yes}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={is_state=yes}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={is_state=yes}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_state=yes
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_state=yes
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
			}
		}
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.4.OPT1
	
			event_target_rebel_province_1={
				particularist_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				particularist_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_3={
				particularist_rebels=3
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.5
		title=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.5.T
		desc=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.5.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			OR={
				government=republic
				government=monarchy
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.5.OPT1
	
			if={
				limit={
					government=republic
				}
				if={
					limit={
						has_reform=dutch_republic
					}
					change_statists_vs_orangists=1
				}
				else={
					add_republican_tradition=-20
				}
				define_ruler={
					name="Willem"
					dynasty="van Oranje"
					adm=4
					dip=6
					mil=4
					claim=90
				}
			}
			else={
				add_legitimacy=-30
				define_ruler={
					name="Willem"
					dynasty="van Oranje"
					adm=4
					dip=6
					mil=4
					claim=90
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.5.OPT2
	
			if={
				limit={
					government=republic
				}
				if={
					limit={
						has_reform=dutch_republic
					}
					change_statists_vs_orangists=-1
				}
				else={
					add_stability=-1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_state=yes
						development=10
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						size=3
						type=pretender_rebels
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				add_stability=-1
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						development=10
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						size=3
						type=pretender_rebels
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.6
		title=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.6.T
		desc=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.6.D
		picture=IMPERIAL_SEAL_eventPicture-+
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			any_country={
				ROOT={defensive_war_with=THIS}
			}
			NOT={is_part_of_hre=yes}
			emperor={
				ai=yes
				NOT={
					war_with=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.6.OPT1
	
			add_prestige=-20
			create_alliance=emperor
			emperor={
				join_all_defensive_wars_of=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.6.OPT2
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.7
		title=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.7.T
		desc=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.7.D
		picture=LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes

		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.7.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_disaster_netherlands_paralyzed_army
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.8
		title=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.8.T
		desc=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.8.D

		is_triggered_only=yes

			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.8.OPT1

				name=fee_disaster_netherlands_trade_advantage_lost
				duration=3650
			}
			random_owned_province={
				add_base_production=-2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.9
		title=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.9.T
		desc=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.9.D
		picture=TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes

			has_country_modifier=fee_disaster_netherlands_trade_advantage_lost
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_netherlands_rampjaar.9.OPT1

				name=fee_disaster_netherlands_more_economic_downturn
				duration=3650
			}

				add_base_production=-2
			}
		}
	}

disaster_fee_partition_of_poland={
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.1
		title=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.1.T
		desc=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.1.D
		picture=BAD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=fee_partition_of_poland_first_neighbor_notification
				clr_country_flag=fee_partition_of_poland_second_neighbor_notification
				set_country_flag=had_fee_partition_of_poland
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-2
			add_prestige=-50
			hidden_effect={
				every_neighbor_country={
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.22}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.2
		title=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.2.T
		desc=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=had_fee_partition_of_poland
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.2.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=20 republican_tradition=20}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_partition_of_poland_survived_partition
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.3
		title=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.3.T
		desc=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.3.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		hidden=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_disaster_progress={
				disaster=fee_partition_of_poland
				value=20
			}
			NOT={
				has_disaster_progress={
					disaster=fee_partition_of_poland
					value=75
				}
			}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_partition_of_poland_first_neighbor_notification}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_partition_of_poland_first_neighbor_notification
				every_neighbor_country={
					limit={
						fee_partition_of_poland_is_valid_neighbor_country={disaster_target=ROOT}
					}
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.4}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.3.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
		}

							is_rival=RUS
						}

						limit={
							is_rival=HAB
						}
						remove_rival=HAB
					}

						who=RUS

					}
					add_opinion={
						who=HAB
						modifier=fee_partition_of_poland_black_eagles_alliance_opinion
					}
					if={
						limit={
							ai=yes
							RUS={ai=yes}
							HAB={ai=yes}
						}
						create_alliance=RUS
						create_alliance=HAB
						RUS={
							create_alliance=HAB
						}
					}
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.10}
				}
				RUS={
					if={
						limit={
							is_rival=PRU
						}
						remove_rival=PRU
					}
					if={
						limit={
							is_rival=HAB
						}
						remove_rival=HAB
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=PRU
						modifier=fee_partition_of_poland_black_eagles_alliance_opinion
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=HAB
						modifier=fee_partition_of_poland_black_eagles_alliance_opinion
					}
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.10}
				}
				HAB={
					if={
						limit={
							is_rival=PRU
						}
						remove_rival=PRU
					}
					if={
						limit={
							is_rival=RUS
						}
						remove_rival=RUS
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=PRU
						modifier=fee_partition_of_poland_black_eagles_alliance_opinion
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=RUS
						modifier=fee_partition_of_poland_black_eagles_alliance_opinion
					}
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.10}
				}

				casus_belli=cb_fee_partition_of_poland
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.14.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=0.3
				modifier={
					factor=3
					alliance_with=FROM
				}
			}
	
			add_prestige=-20
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.15
		title=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.15.T
		desc=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.15.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes

			government=monarchy
			NOT={has_reform=elective_monarchy}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_saved_event_target=rebel_province_1}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_saved_event_target=rebel_province_2}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_saved_event_target=rebel_province_3}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_partition_of_poland.15.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=0.25
				modifier={
					factor=5
					OR={
						num_of_rebel_armies=3
						num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces=5
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_government_reform=elective_monarchy
		}

disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising={
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.1
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.1.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.1.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_4
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_4}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_4}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_4
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-2
			event_target_rebel_province_1={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=3
					leader="Daulat Khan"
					leader_dynasty="Lodi"
				}
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				noble_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_3={
				noble_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_4={
				noble_rebels=3
			}
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=had_fee_pashtun_uprising
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.2
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.2.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes

		option={
			name=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.2.OPT1
	
			add_stability=1
			add_adm_power=100
			add_dip_power=100
			add_mil_power=100
			add_legitimacy=50
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_pashtun_uprising_delhi_rule_confirmed
				duration=18250
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.3
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.3.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.3.D

		is_triggered_only=yes

			NOT={has_country_modifier=fee_pashtun_uprising_abandoned_trade_routes}
		}

				name=fee_pashtun_uprising_abandoned_trade_routes
				duration=3650
				disaster=fee_pashtun_uprising
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.4
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.4.D
		picture=ANGRY_MOB_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
			}
		}

				noble_rebels=3
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				noble_rebels=3
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.5
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.5.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.5.D

	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.6

		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.6.D

			name=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.6.OPT1

				limit={
					any_owned_province={
						has_owner_culture=no
					}
				}

					}
					add_nationalism=10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.7
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.7.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.7.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture

		is_triggered_only=yes

			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.7.OPT1
	
			add_stability=1
			add_legitimacy=-20

			tooltip={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_pashtun_uprising_pacified
					duration=7300
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={

					add_local_autonomy=20
					add_province_modifier={
						name=fee_pashtun_uprising_pacified
						duration=7300
					}
				}
			}
		}

			add_stability=-1

			}

			}

				noble_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.8
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.8.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.8.D

			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}

					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_4
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_4}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_4}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_3}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_4
				}
			}
		}

			}

		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes

		is_triggered_only=yes

			owns=522
			exists=AFG

				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				AFG={
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.11 days=1}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.10.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.11
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.11.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.11.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.11.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=0.8}
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_pashtun_uprising_invasion_of_india
				duration=1825
			}
			hidden_effect={
				522={
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={is_claim=ROOT}
						}
						add_claim=ROOT
						set_province_flag=temp_claim_of_afg
					}
				}
			}
			declare_war_with_cb={
				who=FROM
				casus_belli=cb_conquest
				war_goal_province=522
			}
			hidden_effect={
				522={
					if={
						limit={
							has_province_flag=temp_claim_of_afg
						}
						clr_province_flag=temp_claim_of_afg
						remove_claim=ROOT
					}
				}
				FROM={
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.12}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.11.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={factor=0.2}
	
			add_stability=2
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_nobles
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_nobles
					loyalty=-10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.12
		title=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.12.T
		desc=disaster_fee_pashtun_uprising.12.D

						who=FROM
