						war_goal_province=522
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					owns=578
					controls=578
				}
				578={
					change_controller=FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis={
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.1
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.1.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.1.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						continent=europe
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebels_prov_1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							continent=europe
							is_capital=no
							is_island=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_rebels_prov_1}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							continent=europe
							is_capital=no
							is_island=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_rebels_prov_1}
						}
						save_event_target_as=rebels_prov_2
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							continent=europe
							is_capital=no
							is_island=no
						}
						save_event_target_as=rebels_prov_2
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						any_owned_province={
							continent=europe
							is_capital=no
							is_island=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_rebels_prov_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_rebels_prov_2}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							continent=europe
							is_capital=no
							is_island=no
							NOT={province_id=event_target_rebels_prov_1}
							NOT={province_id=event_target_rebels_prov_2}
						}
						save_event_target_as=rebels_prov_3
					}
				}
				else={
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							continent=europe
							is_capital=no
							is_island=no
						}
						save_event_target_as=rebels_prov_3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-2
			event_target_rebels_prov_1={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					win=yes
				}
			}
			event_target_rebels_prov_2={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					win=yes
				}
			}
			event_target_rebels_prov_3={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					win=yes
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.1.OPT2
	
			add_stability=-2
			tooltip={
				if={
					limit={
						OR={
							has_regency=no
							has_consort_regency=yes
						}
					}
					kill_ruler=yes
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_heir=yes
				}
				kill_heir=yes
			}
			define_ruler={
				age=20
				male=yes
				culture=ROOT
				religion=ROOT
				claim=50
			}
			event_target_rebels_prov_1={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					win=yes
				}
			}
			event_target_rebels_prov_2={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					win=yes
				}
			}
			event_target_rebels_prov_3={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					win=yes
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			set_country_flag=had_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.2
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.2.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.2.OPT1
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
			add_legitimacy=20
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_portuguese_succession_crisis_resolved
				duration=18250
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.3
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.3.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.3.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			any_owned_province={
				continent=europe
				is_capital=no
				is_island=no
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.3.OPT1
	
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					continent=europe
					is_capital=no
					is_island=no
				}
				pretender_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.4
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.4.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			num_of_owned_provinces_with={
				value=2
				continent=europe
				is_capital=no
				is_island=no
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.4.OPT1
	
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					continent=europe
					is_capital=no
					is_island=no
				}
				anti_tax_rebels=2
			}
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					continent=europe
					is_capital=no
					is_island=no
				}
				particularist_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.5
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.5.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.5.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			religion=catholic
			num_of_cardinals=1
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.5.OPT1
	
			tooltip={
				if={
					limit={
						OR={
							has_regency=no
							has_consort_regency=yes
						}
					}
					kill_ruler=yes
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_heir=yes
				}
				kill_heir=yes
			}
			define_ruler={
				name="Henrique"
				dynasty="de Avis"
				age=20
				male=yes
				culture=ROOT
				religion=ROOT
				adm=2
				dip=2
				mil=2
				claim=100
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_dlc="Rights of Man"
				}
				custom_tooltip=PORTUGUESE_SUCCESSION_CRISIS_NEW_RULER_WILL_GAIN_INFERTILE_TRAIT_TT
				hidden_effect={
					add_ruler_personality=infertile_personality
				}
			}
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					has_cardinal=yes
				}
				remove_cardinal=yes
			}
			if={
				limit={
					is_papal_controller=no
				}
				random_country={
					limit={
						is_papal_controller=yes
					}
					country_event={id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.6 days=15}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.5.OPT2
	
			add_legitimacy=-20
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.6
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.6.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.6.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.6.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
				modifier={
					factor=0
					OR={
						ai_attitude={who=FROM attitude=attitude_hostile}
						ai_attitude={who=FROM attitude=attitude_rivalry}
						ai_attitude={who=FROM attitude=attitude_outraged}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_prestige=-10
			add_dip_power=25
			FROM={
				country_event={id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.7 days=15}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_portuguese_succession_crisis_acceptance
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.6.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
				modifier={
					factor=0
					OR={
						ai_attitude={who=FROM attitude=attitude_friendly}
						ai_attitude={who=FROM attitude=attitude_allied}
						ai_attitude={who=FROM attitude=attitude_threatened}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={tag=PAP}
				}
				add_papal_influence=10
			}
			FROM={
				country_event={id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.8 days=15}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_portuguese_succession_crisis_rejection
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.7
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.7.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.7.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.7.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
			add_papal_influence=30
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.8
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.8.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.8.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.8.OPT1
	
			add_legitimacy=-15
			add_ruler_modifier={
				name=fee_portuguese_succession_crisis_chaste_king
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.9
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.9.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.9.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture

			OR={
				stability=-2

			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.9.OPT1

				limit={
					continent=europe
					is_capital=no
					is_island=no
				}
				noble_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.10
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.10.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.10.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		hidden=yes
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes
			OR={
				AND={
					exists=SPA
					SPA={
						valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes
					}
				}
				AND={
					NOT={exists=SPA}
					exists=CAS
					CAS={
						valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						exists=SPA
					}
					SPA={
						country_event={id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.11}
					}
				}
				else={
					CAS={
						country_event={id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.11}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.10.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.11
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.11.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.11.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			tag=POR
		}
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.11.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=75}
	
			if={
				limit={
					alliance_with=FROM
				}
				custom_tooltip=PORTUGUESE_SUCCESSION_CRISIS_BREAK_ALLIANCE_WITH_POR_TT
				hidden_effect={
					add_rival=FROM
					remove_rival=FROM
				}
				tooltip={
					add_truce_with=FROM
				}
			}
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_portuguese_succession_crisis_involvement
			}
			add_casus_belli={
				target=FROM
				type=cb_restore_personal_union
			}
			FROM={
				country_event={id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.12 days=15}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.11.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={factor=25}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_portuguese_succession_crisis_grateful
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.12
		title=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.12.T
		desc=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.12.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes

			name=disaster_fee_portuguese_succession_crisis.12.OPT1
	
			add_mil_power=50
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_portuguese_succession_crisis_invasion_imminent
				duration=1825
			}
		}
	}

					loyalty=-10
				}
				add_estate_influence_modifier={
					estate=estate_nobles
					desc=EST_VAL_FEE_ZEMENE_MESAFINT_REFUSED_RIGHTS
					influence=-5
					duration=7300
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.3.OPT2
	
			add_dip_power=-100
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_nobles
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_nobles
					loyalty=10
				}
				add_estate_influence_modifier={
					estate=estate_nobles
					desc=EST_VAL_FEE_ZEMENE_MESAFINT_NEGOTIATIONS
					influence=5
					duration=7300
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip=FEE_ZEMENE_MESAFINT_10_AUTONOMY_IN_EVERY_CORE_TT
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_core=ROOT
					}
					add_local_autonomy=10
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.3.OPT3
	
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_nobles
				}
				add_estate_loyalty={
					estate=estate_nobles
					loyalty=15
				}
				add_estate_influence_modifier={
					estate=estate_nobles
					desc=EST_VAL_FEE_ZEMENE_MESAFINT_FULLFILLED_DEMANDS
					influence=10
					duration=7300
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip=FEE_ZEMENE_MESAFINT_20_AUTONOMY_IN_EVERY_CORE_TT
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_core=ROOT
					}
					add_local_autonomy=20
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.4
		title=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.4.T
		desc=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.4.D
		picture=BAD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPictue
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.4.OPT1
	
			event_target_rebel_province={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=3
					leader_dynasty="Solomonid"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.5
		title=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.5.T
		desc=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.5.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.5.OPT1
	
			define_ruler={
				name="Mentewab"
				dynasty="Solomonid"
				age=24
				ADM=5
				DIP=5
				MIL=5
				female=yes
			}
			set_ruler_flag=fee_zemene_mesafint_mentewab
			if={
				limit={
					has_dlc="Rights of Man"
				}
				add_ruler_personality=lawgiver_personality
				add_ruler_personality=architectural_visionary_personality
				add_ruler_personality=calm_personality
			}
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-20 republican_tradition=-10}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.5.OPT2
	
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=20 republican_tradition=10}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.6
		title=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.6.T
		desc=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.6.D
		picture=SIEGE_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			any_owned_province={
				has_owner_culture=no
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_4
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_5
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_4}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_5}
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_4}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_5}
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_5}
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_4
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						has_owner_culture=no
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_2}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_3}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_target_province_4}
					}
					save_event_target_as=target_province_5
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.6.OPT1
	
			event_target_target_province_1={
				add_nationalism=10
			}
			event_target_target_province_2={
				add_nationalism=10
			}
			event_target_target_province_3={
				add_nationalism=10
			}
			event_target_target_province_4={
				add_nationalism=10
			}
			event_target_target_province_5={
				add_nationalism=10
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.7
		title=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.7.T
		desc=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.7.D
		picture=ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			NOT={has_ruler_flag=fee_zemene_mesafint_mentewab}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.7.OPT1

				kill_ruler=yes
			}

				dynasty=Solomonid
			}
			add_stability=-1
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-20 republican_tradition=-10}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.8
		title=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.8.T
		desc=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.8.D

					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}

					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
					}

				}
			}
		}

			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.8.OPT1

			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.8.OPT2
	
			add_stability=-1

				noble_rebels=2
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_2={
				noble_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.9

		desc=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.9.D

					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_1
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						is_capital=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_2
				}
				random_owned_province={
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						is_capital=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_1}
						NOT={province_id=event_target_rebel_province_2}
						is_capital=no
						is_island=no
					}
					save_event_target_as=rebel_province_3
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.9.OPT1
	
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-20 republican_tradition=-10}
			add_disaster_modifier={
				name=fee_zemene_mesafint_wara_sheh_dynasty
				duration=18250
				disaster=fee_zemene_mesafint
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=disaster_fee_zemene_mesafint.9.OPT2
	
			event_target_rebel_province_pretender_1={
				pretender_rebels=2
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_pretender_2={
				pretender_rebels=2
			}
			event_target_rebel_province_pretender_3={
				pretender_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Advisor_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.1
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.1.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				advisor=treasurer
				advisor=master_of_mint
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=600
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.1.OPT1
	
			add_treasury=300
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.2
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.2.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.2.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				advisor=treasurer
				advisor=master_of_mint
			}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=600
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.2.OPT1
	
			add_treasury=-320
			custom_tooltip=EVERY_OWNED_CORE_PROVINCE_MINUS_2_UNREST
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_core=ROOT
					}
					add_unrest=-2
				}
				random_list={
					16={
						country_event={id=FEE_Advisor_Event.3 days=345 random=40}
					}
					16={
						country_event={id=FEE_Advisor_Event.4 days=345 random=40}
					}
					16={
						country_event={id=FEE_Advisor_Event.5 days=345 random=40}
					}
					16={
						country_event={id=FEE_Advisor_Event.6 days=345 random=40}
					}
					16={
						country_event={id=FEE_Advisor_Event.7 days=345 random=40}
					}
					16={
						country_event={id=FEE_Advisor_Event.8 days=345 random=40}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.2.OPT2
	
			custom_tooltip=EVERY_OWNED_CORE_PROVINCE_PLUS_1_UNREST
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_core=ROOT
					}
					add_unrest=1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.3
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.3.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.3.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.3.OPT1
	
			custom_tooltip=EVERY_OWNED_CORE_PROVINCE_PLUS_1_UNREST
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_core=ROOT
					}
					add_unrest=1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.3.OPT2
	
			add_adm_power=-50
		}
	
		after={
			clr_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.4
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.4.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.4.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						religion=catholic
						exists=PAP
					}
					PAP={
						save_event_target_as=fee_statue_target
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						religion=catholic
						any_country={
							is_papal_controller=yes
						}
					}
					random_country={
						limit={
							is_papal_controller=yes
						}
						save_event_target_as=fee_statue_target
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						any_country={
							religion=ROOT
						}
					}
					random_country={
						limit={
							religion=ROOT
						}
						save_event_target_as=fee_statue_target
					}
				}
				else={
					save_event_target_as=fee_statue_target
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.4.OPT1
	
			if={
				limit={
					event_target_fee_statue_target={
						NOT={tag=ROOT}
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						event_target_fee_statue_target={
							tag=PAP
						}
					}
					every_country={
						limit={
							religion=ROOT
						}
						add_opinion={
							who=ROOT
							modifier=fee_advisor_religious_statue
						}
					}
				}
				else={
					event_target_fee_statue_target={
						add_opinion={
							who=ROOT
							modifier=fee_advisor_religious_statue
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			clr_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.5
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.5.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.5.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW

			has_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active

			}
		}

		}
	}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.7
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.7.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.7.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW

			has_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active

			add_prestige=-15
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.7.OPT2

			add_prestige=-10

				}

			}

				}

		}
	
		after={
			clr_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.8
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.8.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.8.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_events_for_monumental_suggestion_active
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.8.OPT1
	
			add_ruler_modifier={
				name=fee_ruler_trait_lustful
				duration=-1
			}
			if={
				limit={
					religion=catholic
					exists=PAP
				}
				PAP={
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_advisor_openly_lustful_ruler
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				every_country={
					limit={
						religion=ROOT
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_advisor_openly_lustful_ruler_small
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Advisor_Event.8.OPT2
	
			if={
				limit={
					religion=catholic
					exists=PAP
				}
				PAP={
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_advisor_pious_ruler
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				every_country={
					limit={
						religion=ROOT
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_advisor_pious_ruler_small
					}
				}
			}
		}

		id=FEE_Advisor_Event.26
		title=FEE_Advisor_Event.26.T
		desc=FEE_Advisor_Event.26.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_events_for_the_brilliant_inventor_active

			if={
				limit={
					OR={
						advisor=army_reformer
						advisor=army_organiser
						advisor=commandant
						advisor=grand_captain
						advisor=naval_reformer
						advisor=quartermaster
						advisor=recruitmaster
					}
				}
				random={
					chance=50
					if={
						limit={
							advisor=army_reformer
						}
						kill_advisor=army_reformer
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							advisor=army_organiser
						}
						kill_advisor=army_organiser
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							advisor=commandant
						}
						kill_advisor=commandant
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							advisor=grand_captain
						}
						kill_advisor=grand_captain
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							advisor=naval_reformer
						}
						kill_advisor=naval_reformer
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							advisor=quartermaster
						}
						kill_advisor=quartermaster
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							advisor=recruitmaster
						}
						kill_advisor=recruitmaster
					}
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag=fee_events_for_the_brilliant_inventor_active
		}
	}

}
FEE_Ajuuraan_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.1
		title=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.1.D
		picture=CORRUPTION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=AJU
			OR={
				AND={
					NOT={
						exists=MDI
					}
					owns_core_province=1205
				}
				MDI={
					is_subject_of=AJU
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=48
			modifier={
				factor=0.5
				has_idea_group=economic_ideas
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_aju_mogadishu_currency
				duration=-1
			}
			1205={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_aju_mogadishu_administration
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.2
		title=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.2.D
		picture=HARBOUR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=AJU
				tag=MDI
			}
			owns_core_province=1205
			is_at_war=no
			is_year=1500
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=95
			}
	
			1205={
				add_base_production=1
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_aju_toob_menadir
					duration=-1
				}
			}
			MAM={
				country_event={id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.3}
			}
			SYR={
				country_event={id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.3}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					TUR={
						OR={
							owns_core_province=382
							owns_core_province=361
						}
					}
				}
				country_event={id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.3}
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=5
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=15}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.3
		title=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.3.D
		picture=HARBOUR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_opinion={
				who=FROM
				value=-10
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.3.OPT1
			add_treasury=20
	
			add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_aju_toob_menadir_trade
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.4
		title=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.4.D
		picture=LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=AJU
			is_year=1480
			NOT={
				is_year=1560
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=240
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.4.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-1
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=10}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_aju_local_conscripts
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.4.OPT2
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_aju_reliance_mercenaries
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.5
		title=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.5.T
		desc=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.5.D
		picture=RELIGION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			tag=AJU
			is_year=1480
			NOT={is_year=1700}
			OR={
				GRA={
					OR={
						religion=sunni
						religion=shiite
						religion=ibadi
					}
					NOT={
						num_of_cities=6
					}
				}
				NOT={exists=GRA}
				any_country={
					capital_scope={
						region=arabia_region
					}
					OR={
						religion=sunni
						religion=shiite
						religion=ibadi
					}
					war_exhaustion=3
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=1200
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.5.OPT1
	
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=20}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			add_adm_power=25
			define_advisor={
				type=theologian
				skill=2
				discount=yes
			}
			define_advisor={
				type=diplomat
				skill=2
				discount=yes
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.5.OPT2
	
			create_general={tradition=40}
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=20}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			add_mil_power=25
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ajuuraan_Events.5.OPT3
	
			add_dip_power=25
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			capital_scope={
				add_base_production=1
				add_base_tax=1
				add_base_manpower=1
			}
		}
	}

			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=5 republican_tradition=3}
		}
	}
	
	
	

}
FEE_Aragon_Events={
	
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Aragon_Events.1
		title=FEE_Aragon_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Aragon_Events.1.D
		picture=ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=ARA
				tag=SPA
			}
			is_year=1480
			NOT={is_year=1495}
			owns_core_province=214
			religion=catholic
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
			modifier={
				factor=0.3
				advisor=inquisitor
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.75
				advisor=theologian
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
			}
	
			add_adm_power=25
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=10}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_aragon_arbues_saint
				duration=10950
			}
			if={
				limit={advisor=inquisitor}
				kill_advisor=inquisitor
			}
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={advisor=inquisitor}
				}
				kill_advisor=random
			}
			214={
				if={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					add_province_modifier={
						name=fee_aragon_arbues_saint_province
						duration=7300
					}
				}
			}
			2990={
				if={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					add_province_modifier={
						name=fee_aragon_arbues_saint_province
						duration=7300
					}
				}
			}

				if={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					add_province_modifier={
						name=fee_aragon_arbues_saint_province
						duration=7300
					}
				}
			}
		}

				factor=10

			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=10}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_aragon_arbues_no
				duration=10950
			}

				limit={advisor=inquisitor}
				kill_advisor=inquisitor

		title=FEE_Aragon_Events.16.T
		desc=FEE_Aragon_Events.16.D
		picture=ELECTION_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_modifier=fee_aragon_building_imperial_canal
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=18
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_step_one
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.16.OPT1
			add_years_of_income=-0.2
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.16.OPT2
			add_adm_power=-10
			set_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_slow_one
			custom_tooltip=FEE_Aragon_Events.16.TT
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Aragon_Events.17
		title=FEE_Aragon_Events.17.T
		desc=FEE_Aragon_Events.17.D
		picture=ECONOMY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_modifier=fee_aragon_building_imperial_canal
			has_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_step_one
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=18
			modifier={
				factor=1.2
				has_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_slow_one
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_step_two
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.17.OPT1
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_pignatelli
			}
	
			add_adm_power=-50
			define_advisor={
				type=philosopher
				skill=2
				name="Ramon Pignatelli"
				discount=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.17.OPT2
	
			add_adm_power=25
			custom_tooltip=FEE_Aragon_Events.16.TT
			set_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_slow_two
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Aragon_Events.18
		title=FEE_Aragon_Events.18.T
		desc=FEE_Aragon_Events.18.D
		picture=FARMING_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			owns=214
			has_country_modifier=fee_aragon_building_imperial_canal
			has_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_step_two
			has_country_flag=fee_aragon_pignatelli
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=18
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.18.OPT1
	
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=15}
			214={
				add_base_tax=1
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.18.OPT2
	
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=15}
			custom_tooltip=FEE_Aragon_Events.16.TT
			set_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_slow_three
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Aragon_Events.19
		title=FEE_Aragon_Events.19.T
		desc=FEE_Aragon_Events.19.D
		picture=HARBOUR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_modifier=fee_aragon_building_imperial_canal
			has_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_step_two
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=18
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_imperial_canal_event_timer
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_step_four
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.19.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Aragon_Events.19.OPT2

			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_aragon_channel_slow_four

FEE_Austria_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Austria_Events.1
		title=FEE_Austria_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Austria_Events.1.D
		picture=HRE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=HAB
			is_emperor=yes
			is_year=1480
			NOT={
				is_religion_enabled=protestant
			}
			NOT={hre_reform_passed=hofgericht}
			NOT={hre_reform_passed=emperor_reichsstabilitaet}
			imperial_influence=20
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_imperial_influence=20
			add_dip_power=20
			add_mil_power=20
			add_stability=-1
			if={
				limit={
					61={
						is_part_of_hre=yes
					}
				}
				61={
					add_base_tax=1
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_hab_reforms_diet_worms
				duration=365
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_imperial_influence=-20
			every_country={
				limit={
					is_part_of_hre=yes
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=HAB
					modifier=fee_hab_protected_imperial_status_quo
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Austria_Events.2
		title=FEE_Austria_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Austria_Events.2.D
		picture=HRE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=HAB
			TUR={
				num_of_cities=12
			}
			NOT={
				any_owned_province={
					NOT={
						continent=europe
					}
				}
			}
			OR={
				any_owned_province={
					any_neighbor_province={
						owned_by=TUR
					}
				}
				any_subject_country={
					any_owned_province={
						any_neighbor_province={
							owned_by=TUR
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=6
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
			}
	
			add_mil_power=50
			add_manpower=3
			add_army_tradition=5.0
			add_opinion={
				who=TUR
				modifier=fee_hab_bulwark_christendom
			}
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=TUR
				modifier=fee_hab_bulwark_christendom
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
	
			add_dip_power=25
			add_treasury=10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Austria_Events.3
		title=FEE_Austria_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Austria_Events.3.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=HAB
			is_year=1650
			NOT={is_year=1730}
			government=monarchy
			num_of_cities=10
			legitimacy=80
			stability=1
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=600
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				stability=2
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				legitimacy_equivalent=100
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=85
			}
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_hab_austrian_baroque
				duration=-1
			}
			custom_tooltip=fee_hab_austrian_continue_develop_tt
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.3.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=15
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_adm_power=10
			add_dip_power=10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Austria_Events.4
		title=FEE_Austria_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Austria_Events.4.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_modifier=fee_hab_austrian_baroque
			is_year=1715
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=300
			modifier={
				factor=0.1
				has_disaster=aspiration_for_liberty
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.3
				is_year=1740
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.4.OPT1
	
			remove_country_modifier=fee_hab_austrian_baroque
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Austria_Events.5
		title=FEE_Austria_Events.5.T
		desc=FEE_Austria_Events.5.D
		picture=GREAT_BUILDING_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			tag=HAB
			has_country_modifier=fee_hab_austrian_baroque
			NOT={
				has_country_modifier=fee_hab_baroque_building_timer

		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=90
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Austria_Events.5.OPT1

				factor=75

					factor=25

					}
				}

					factor=0

				factor=25

					factor=75

					NOT={

					}
				}

FEE_Bavaria_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bavaria_Events.1
		title=FEE_Bavaria_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Bavaria_Events.1.D
		picture=BORDER_TENSION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=BAV
			NOT={is_year=1555}
			owns_core_province=65
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bavaria_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
			add_manpower=-2
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_bav_defeated_robber_barons
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bavaria_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_treasury=25
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bavaria_Events.2
		title=FEE_Bavaria_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Bavaria_Events.2.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=BAV
			is_year=1490
			all_owned_province={
				OR={
					AND={
						culture=bavarian
						NOT={
							local_autonomy=10
						}
					}
					NOT={culture=bavarian}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=60
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bavaria_Events.2.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=25 republican_tradition=13}
		}
	
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bavaria_Events.3
		title=FEE_Bavaria_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Bavaria_Events.3.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=BAV
			is_year=1520
			NOT={is_year=1600}
			is_at_war=no
			NOT={is_rival=HAB}
			is_lesser_in_union=no
			dynasty="von Wittelsbach"
			HAB={
				exists=yes
				is_emperor=yes
				dynasty="von Habsburg"
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bavaria_Events.3.OPT1
	
			HAB={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_bav_reconcile_habsburgs
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bavaria_Events.3.OPT2
	
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=5 republican_tradition=3}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			HAB={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_bav_against_habsburgs
				}
			}
		}
	}

}
FEE_Berbers_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Berbers_Events.1
		title=FEE_Berbers_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Berbers_Events.1.D
		picture=SHIP_SAILING_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			capital_scope={
				region=maghreb_region
			}
			maghreb_region={
				has_port=yes
				owned_by=ROOT
			}
			religion_group=muslim
			is_year=1490
			NOT={is_year=1520}
			NOT={has_country_modifier=fee_berbers_support_barbary_pirates}
			NOT={tag=MAM}
			NOT={tag=EGY}
			OR={
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				overlord={
					OR={
						religion=sunni
						religion=ibadi
						religion=shiite
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=300
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				TUR={
					num_of_cities=20
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Berbers_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
			}
	
			add_dip_power=-25
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_berbers_support_barbary_pirates
				duration=-1
			}
			custom_tooltip=fee_berbers_support_pirates_tt
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Berbers_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Berbers_Events.2
		title=FEE_Berbers_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Berbers_Events.2.D
		picture=NAVAL_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_modifier=fee_berbers_support_barbary_pirates
			maghreb_region={
				owned_by=ROOT
				has_port=yes
			}
			any_country={
				OR={
					religion=catholic
					religion=protestant
					religion=reformed
				}
				any_owned_province={
					OR={
						region=italy_region
						area=languedoc_area
						area=provence_area
						area=catalonia_area
						area=valencia_area
						area=upper_andalucia_area
						area=toledo_area
						region=balkan_region
					}
					has_port=yes
					NOT={
						has_province_modifier=fee_berbers_raided_by_pirates
					}
					is_capital=no
				}
				OR={
					NOT={has_country_flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag}
					had_country_flag={
						flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag
						days=5475
					}
				}
				NOT={
					truce_with=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=480
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Berbers_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=80
			}
			add_treasury=-10
			add_dip_power=-5
			random_list={
				85={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Berbers_Events.5
						days=60
					}
					random_country={
						limit={
							OR={
								religion=catholic
								religion=protestant
								religion=reformed
							}
							OR={
								NOT={has_country_flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag}
								had_country_flag={
									flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag
									days=5475
								}
							}
							any_owned_province={
								has_port=yes
								OR={
									region=italy_region
									area=languedoc_area
									area=provence_area
									area=catalonia_area
									area=valencia_area
									area=upper_andalucia_area
									area=toledo_area
									region=balkan_region
								}
								is_capital=no
							}
						}
						random_owned_province={
							limit={
								has_port=yes
								OR={
									region=italy_region
									area=languedoc_area
									area=provence_area
									area=catalonia_area
									area=valencia_area
									area=upper_andalucia_area
									area=toledo_area
									region=balkan_region
								}
								NOT={
									has_province_modifier=fee_berbers_raided_by_pirates
								}
								is_capital=no
							}
							province_event={
								id=FEE_Berbers_Events.3
								days=30
								random=10
							}
						}
					}
				}
				15={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Berbers_Events.6
						days=60
					}
					random_country={
						limit={
							OR={
								religion=catholic
								religion=protestant
								religion=reformed
							}
							OR={
								NOT={has_country_flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag}
								had_country_flag={
									flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag
									days=5475
								}
							}
							any_owned_province={
								has_port=yes
								OR={
									region=italy_region
									area=languedoc_area
									area=provence_area
									area=catalonia_area
									area=valencia_area
									area=upper_andalucia_area
									area=toledo_area
									region=balkan_region
								}
								is_capital=no
							}
						}
						random_owned_province={
							limit={
								has_port=yes
								owner={
									OR={
										religion=catholic
										religion=protestant
										religion=reformed
									}
									OR={
										NOT={has_country_flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag}
										had_country_flag={
											flag=fee_berbers_retaliation_flag
											days=5475
										}
									}
								}
								OR={
									region=italy_region
									area=languedoc_area
									area=provence_area
									area=catalonia_area
									area=valencia_area
									area=upper_andalucia_area
									area=toledo_area
									region=balkan_region
								}
								NOT={
									has_province_modifier=fee_berbers_raided_by_pirates
								}
							}
							province_event={
								id=FEE_Berbers_Events.4 days=30 random=10
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Berbers_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=20
			}
	
			add_dip_power=50
		}
	}
	
	province_event={
		id=FEE_Berbers_Events.3
		title=FEE_Berbers_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Berbers_Events.3.D

				}

FEE_Bohemia_Events={
	Namespace=FEE_Bohemia_Events
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bohemia_Events.1
		title=FEE_Bohemia_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Bohemia_Events.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		hidden=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=HUN
			has_country_flag=hun_has_had_matthias_corvinus_event	#vanilla flag
			has_regency=no
			mil=6
			NOT={
				is_year=1500
			}
		}
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_hungary_corvinus
				set_ruler_flag=fee_hungary_matyas_reign
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bohemia_Events.1.OPT1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bohemia_Events.2
		title=FEE_Bohemia_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Bohemia_Events.2.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		hidden=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=BOH
			has_country_flag=first_hussite_king	#vanilla flag
		}
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=FEE_Podebrad
				add_ruler_modifier={
					name=fee_boh_infertility
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bohemia_Events.2.OPT1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bohemia_Events.3
		title=FEE_Bohemia_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Bohemia_Events.3.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			tag=BOH
			NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_boh_infertility}
			has_country_flag=FEE_Podebrad
			is_year=1471
			is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
			has_regency=yes
		}
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=60
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bohemia_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
			}
	
			add_stability=2
			define_ruler={
				name="Vladislav"
				dynasty="Jagiellon"
				adm=2
				dip=4
				mil=2
			}
			kill_heir=yes
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_nobles
				}
				change_estate_land_share={
					estate=estate_nobles
					share=20
				}
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_boh_noble_concesions
					duration=-1
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=POL
				}
				POL={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Bohemia_Events.4
						days=30
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_province={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					leader_dynasty="z Podebrad"
					leader="Bocek 'the Disabled'"
				}
			}
			random_owned_province={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					leader_dynasty="z Podebrad"
					leader="Henry 'the Younger'"
				}

				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
					leader_dynasty="z Podebrad"
					leader="Henry 'the Elder'"
				}

					size=2
					leader_dynasty="z Podebrad"
					leader="Victor"
				}
			}

			name=FEE_Bohemia_Events.3.OPT2

				factor=1
			}

				name="Victor z"
				dynasty="z Podebrad"

			}

			}

	}

			}
		}
	}

FEE_Bulgaria_Events={
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.1
		title=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.1.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_subject=no
			tag=BUL
			owns_core_province=4704
			grown_by_development=20
			4704={
				development=12
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=24
		}
	
		option={
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
			name=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.1.OPT1
			4704={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=FEE_Tarnovo_Great_Fort
					duration=-1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							has_building=fort_15th
						}
					}
					owner={add_treasury=-100}
					add_building=fort_15th
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.1.OPT2
	
			4704={
				add_base_manpower=2
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_Bulgarian_Recruitment_Drive
				duration=1825
			}
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.1.OPT3
	
			4704={
				add_base_tax=1
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_Bulgarian_Administrative_Improvement
				duration=1825
			}
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.1.OPT4
	
			4704={
				add_base_production=2
				add_province_modifier={
					name=FEE_Tarnovo_Agrarian_Improvement
					duration=1825
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.2
		title=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.2.D

			is_subject=no
			tag=BUL

			is_at_war=no
		}

			months=2
		}

				name=FEE_Bulgarian_Parades_Through_Tsargrad
				duration=3650
			}
			151={
				rename_capital="Tsargrad"
				add_devastation=-10
				change_province_name="Tsargrad"
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.3
		title=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Bulgaria_Events.3.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture

FEE_Bundelkhand_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Bundelkhand_Events.1
		title=FEE_Bundelkhand_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Bundelkhand_Events.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=BND
			capital=559
			is_year=1525
			NOT={is_year=1550}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=60
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Bundelkhand_Events.1.OPT1 #Splendid.
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			559={
				change_province_name="Orchha"
				rename_capital="Orchha"
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							OR={
								has_building=fort_15th
								has_building=fort_16th
								has_building=fort_17th
								has_building=fort_18th
							}
						}
					}
					add_building_construction={
						building=fort_15th
						speed=0.75
						cost=0
					}
				}
				else={
					add_base_manpower=2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

FEE_Catholic_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Catholic_Events.1
		title=FEE_Catholic_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Catholic_Events.1.D
		picture=IMPORTANT_STATUE_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			NOT={is_religion_enabled=protestant}
			religion=catholic
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=840
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				advisor=artist
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Catholic_Events.1.OPT1
	
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=10}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Catholic_Events.1.OPT2
			trigger={
				ai=no
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=0.3
			add_reform_desire=0.01
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=5}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Catholic_Events.1.OPT3
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=5}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Catholic_Events.2
		title=FEE_Catholic_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Catholic_Events.2.D
		picture=RELIGION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			NOT={is_religion_enabled=protestant}
			religion=catholic
			reform_desire=0.02
			OR={
				NOT={has_country_flag=fee_popular_piety_timer}
				had_country_flag={
					flag=fee_popular_piety_timer
					days=18250
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=600
			modifier={
				factor=1.2
				advisor=inquisitor
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.9
				advisor=theologian
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=fee_popular_piety_timer
				set_country_flag=fee_popular_piety_timer
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Catholic_Events.2.OPT1
			trigger={
				ai=no
			}
	
			add_reform_desire=0.01
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=15}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_cath_piety_resisted
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Catholic_Events.2.OPT2
	
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=15}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_cath_piety_supported
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	}

}
FEE_Charles_V_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Charles_V_Events.1
		title=FEE_Charles_V_Events.1.T #FEE_Charles_V_Events.T.1_0 "The Habsburg dynasty in Castille"
		desc=FEE_Charles_V_Events.1.D #FEE_Charles_V_Events.D.1_0 "The son of Maximillian I of Habsburg and Mary of Burgundy, Phillip I would succeed in winning the crown of Castille for the Habsburg dynasty. Already the ruler of the Austrian lowlands through his mother, in 1506 Phillip organized a coup and overthrew the acting king of Spain, Ferdinand II. Though he died mere months later, Philip's legacy would live on through his son Charles, who would come to rule over one of the largest empires in history..."
		picture=NEW_HEIR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={		#Fires for Spain or Castille
				tag=CAS
				tag=SPA
			}
			is_year=1500
			NOT={is_year=1550}#Fairly wide window, to give Spain time to realize she hates France
			NOT={has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_born}
			OR={
				has_global_flag=burgundian_succession_crisis
			}
			num_of_cities=15
			is_subject=no
			government=monarchy
	
			NOT={has_regency=yes}
			capital_scope={
				continent=europe
			}
			HAB={		#Austria must be Habsburg
				dynasty="von Habsburg"
			}
			if={
				limit={
					FRA={
						is_free_or_tributary_trigger=no
						num_of_cities=15
						NOT={dynasty=ROOT}
					}
				}
				OR={
					CAS={
						is_rival=FRA
					}
					SPA={
						is_rival=FRA
					}
				}
				HAB={
					is_rival=FRA
				}
			}
			NOT={
				OR={
					is_rival=HAB
					war_with=HAB
					is_enemy=HAB
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.1.OPT1 #FEE_Charles_V_Events.1.OPT1_0 "Interesting..."
	
			define_heir={
				name="Charles"
				dynasty="von Habsburg"
			}
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_born
				HAB={
					country_event={id=flavor_spa.14}#Gives Austria the generic notification of Habsburg on a foreign throne
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.1.OPT2 #Not allowing Charles as heir
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Charles_V_Events.2
		title=FEE_Charles_V_Events.2.T		#FEE_Charles_V_Events.T.2_0 "Charles Ascends to the Throne"
		desc=FEE_Charles_V_Events.2.D			#FEE_Charles_V_Events.D.2_0 "With his father having died in 1506, when Charles came of age in 1515 he aquired the title of Duke of Burgundy, which brought with it rulership over the Netherlands. A year later,the death of his grandfather Maximillian I made him ruler of all the Habsburg posessions in Germany, including the Archduchy of Austria.That same year, the death of Ferdinand II left the crowns of Aragon, Castille, and Leon to his mother Joanna. With Joanna being unsound of mind, Charles was declared co-ruler of each kingdom, and assumed de facto rulership over his mother's posessions. Finally, Charles was crowned Holy Roman Empire in 1530. Taken altogether, Charles's dominion encompassed most of Iberia, large portions of Western and Central Europe, as well as the Spanish colonies in Asia and the Americas. This arrangement however, did not sit well with France, who felt cornered by their Habsburg enemies, and were eager to reverse their fortunes..."
		fire_only_once=yes
		picture=HRE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes		#triggered on new monarch
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_born
			HAB={		#Austria must be Habsburg
				dynasty="von Habsburg"
			}
			has_ruler="Charles"
			hre_size=1
			NOT={junior_union_with=HAB}#Won't fire if already in a union with Austria.
			NOT={senior_union_with=HAB}
			NOT={has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_dead}#Won't fire if Chalres died as an heir
			NOT={has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_ruler}
		}
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			OR={
				capital_scope={
					superregion=europe_superregion
				}
				is_part_of_hre=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.2.OPT1	#FEE_Charles_V_Events.2.OPT1_0 "Long may he reign!"
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_ruler
			}
			custom_tooltip="Charles von Habsburg will become ruler."
			define_heir={
				dynasty="von Habsburg"
				name="Phillip II"
				adm=3
				dip=3
				mil=3
				age=0
			}
	
			ROOT={
				capital_scope={	#Puts Spain in the Empire
					set_in_empire=yes
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					HAB={
						dynasty="von Habsburg"
						is_emperor=yes
					}
				}
				set_emperor=yes
			}
			HAB={
				if={
					limit={
						has_subject_of_type=personal_union
					}
					every_subject_country={
						limit={
							is_subject_of_type=personal_union
						}
						set_country_flag=fee_charles_v_pu_austria
					}
				}
			}
	
			create_union=HAB	#Once all that silliness is done, create the PU
			custom_tooltip="Charles von Habsburg will become the Holy Roman Emperor"
			set_government_rank_force=2 #Putting Spain in the HRE makes it a duke, this fixes that.
	
			custom_tooltip=fee_charles_v_fear_empire_tt
			tooltip={
				random_country={
					limit={
						OR={
							is_part_of_hre=yes
							capital_scope={
								superregion=europe_superregion
							}
						}
						NOT={
							junior_union_with=ROOT
						}
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_charles_v_fear_of_empire
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				every_country={
					limit={
						OR={
							is_part_of_hre=yes
							capital_scope={
								superregion=europe_superregion
							}
						}
						NOT={
							junior_union_with=ROOT
						}
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_charles_v_fear_of_empire
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Charles_V_Events.3
		title=FEE_Charles_V_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Charles_V_Events.3.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_born		#Charles has been born (to prevent misfires)
			has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_ruler		#CharlesV is the ruler
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_abdicate_option}
			HAB={									#Austria must still be in the PU
				junior_union_with=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=600 #50 Years
		}
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			OR={
				capital_scope={
					superregion=europe_superregion
				}
				is_part_of_hre=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=100	#AI has a 100 to 1 chance of choosing the abdicate option
			}
	
			set_government_rank=2
			set_country_flag=fee_charles_v_abdicate_option
	
			break_union=HAB			#Breaks the PU with Austria
			custom_tooltip=fee_charles_v_abdication_charles_tt
			if={
				limit={
					has_ruler="Charles"
				}
				kill_ruler=yes
			}
			hidden_effect={
				ROOT={
					if={
						limit={
							has_subject_of_type=personal_union
						}
						every_subject_country={
							limit={
								is_subject_of_type=personal_union
								has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_pu_austria
							}
							HAB={
								create_union=PREV
							}
						}
					}
					create_alliance=HAB
				}
				HAB={					#Cedes the Austian Netherlands to Spain/Castille
					every_core_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								region=low_countries_region
								region=france_region
							}
						}
						cede_province=ROOT
						add_core=ROOT
						remove_core=HAB
					}
					define_ruler={
						dynasty="von Habsburg"
						name="Ferdinand I"
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						exists=HAB			#If Austria still exists, she gets any non-lowcountry provinces Spain might have eaten in the HRE.
					}
					every_core_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								region=north_german_region
								region=south_german_region
							}
							is_part_of_hre=yes
						}
						cede_province=HAB
						add_core=HAB
						remove_core=ROOT
					}
				}
				every_core_province={		#Any provinces outside of Germany owned by Spain will be removed from the Empire. This should take Spain out of the Empire for good.
					limit={
						NOT={
							OR={
								region=north_german_region
								region=south_german_region
								region=low_countries_region
								region=france_region
							}
						}
						is_part_of_hre=yes
					}
					set_in_empire=no
				}
				if={					#Castille/Spain gets France Compte too.
					limit={
						193={		#France Compte
							owned_by=HAB
						}
					}
					193={
						cede_province=ROOT
						add_core=ROOT
					}
				}
			}
	
	
			custom_tooltip=fee_charles_v_europe_no_longer_afraid_tt
			hidden_effect={
				every_country={
					limit={
						has_opinion_modifier={
							modifier=fee_charles_v_fear_of_empire
							who=ROOT
						}
					}
					remove_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_charles_v_fear_of_empire
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.3.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=1	#AI has a 100 to 1 chance of choosing the abdicate option
			}
	
			set_country_flag=fee_charles_v_abdicate_option
			add_ruler_modifier={
				name=fee_charles_v_charles_is_weak
			}
			add_stability=-2				#The nation will get testy
			low_countries_region={			#The Lowcountries will be problematic
				limit={
					owned_by=ROOT
					is_core=ROOT
				}
				add_unrest=7
			}
	
			HAB={
				add_ruler_modifier={
					name=fee_charles_v_charles_is_weak_c
				}
				capital_scope={
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=3
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
				random_core_province={
					limit={
						region=south_german_region
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=3
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
				random_core_province={
					limit={
						region=south_german_region
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=1
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					BOH={
						is_subject_of_type=personal_union
						has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_pu_austria
					}
				}
				BOH={
					capital_scope={
						spawn_rebels={
							type=pretender_rebels
							size=2
							leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					HUN={
						is_subject_of_type=personal_union
						has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_pu_austria
					}
				}
				HUN={
					capital_scope={
						spawn_rebels={
							type=pretender_rebels
							size=2
							leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Charles_V_Events.4
		title=FEE_Charles_V_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Charles_V_Events.4.D #FEE_Charles_V_Events.D.1_0
		picture=NEW_HEIR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_born		#Charles has been born
			NOT={
				has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_ruler	#But he isn't King yet
			}
			NOT={has_heir="Charles"}
			NOT={has_ruler="Charles"}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_dead	#Prevents chain from continuing
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.4.OPT1
	
			add_splendor=-100
			add_prestige=-25
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-25 republican_tradition=-13}
		}
	}
	
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Charles_V_Events.10
		title=FEE_Charles_V_Events.10.T
		desc=FEE_Charles_V_Events.10.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_born		#Charles has been born (to prevent misfires)
			has_country_flag=FEE_Charles_V_Events_ruler		#CharlesV is the ruler
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_abdicate_option}
			NOT={has_ruler="Charles"}
			NOT={has_heir="Charles"}
			HAB={									#Austria must still be in the PU
				junior_union_with=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			OR={
				capital_scope={
					superregion=europe_superregion
				}
				is_part_of_hre=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.10.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=100	#AI has a 100 to 1 chance of choosing the abdicate option
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					has_ruler="Charles"
				}
				kill_ruler=yes
			}
			break_union=HAB			#Breaks the PU with Austria
			custom_tooltip=fee_charles_v_abdication_charles_tt
	
			hidden_effect={
				ROOT={
					if={
						limit={
							has_subject_of_type=personal_union
						}
						every_subject_country={
							limit={
								is_subject_of_type=personal_union
								has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_pu_austria
							}
							HAB={
								create_union=PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
				HAB={					#Cedes the Austian Netherlands to Spain/Castille
					every_core_province={
						limit={
							region=low_countries_region
						}
						cede_province=ROOT
						add_core=ROOT
						remove_core=HAB
					}
					define_ruler={
						dynasty="von Habsburg"
						name="Ferdinand I"
					}
				}
				if={					#Castille/Spain gets France Compte too.
					limit={
						193={		#France Compte
							owned_by=HAB
						}
					}
					193={
						cede_province=ROOT
						add_core=ROOT
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						exists=HAB			#If Austria still exists, she gets any non-lowcountry provinces Spain might have eaten in the HRE.
					}
					every_core_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								region=north_german_region
								region=south_german_region
							}
							is_part_of_hre=yes
						}
						cede_province=HAB
						add_core=HAB
						remove_core=ROOT
					}
				}
				north_german_region={
					limit={
						is_part_of_hre=yes
						is_core=ROOT
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					set_in_empire=no
				}
				south_german_region={
					limit={
						is_part_of_hre=yes
						is_core=ROOT
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					set_in_empire=no
				}
				low_countries_region={
					limit={
						is_part_of_hre=yes
						is_core=ROOT
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					set_in_empire=no
				}
				france_region={
					limit={
						is_part_of_hre=yes
						is_core=ROOT
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					set_in_empire=no
				}
			}
	
	
			set_country_flag=fee_charles_v_abdicate_option
	
			custom_tooltip=fee_charles_v_europe_no_longer_afraid_tt
			hidden_effect={
				every_country={
					limit={
						has_opinion_modifier={
							modifier=fee_charles_v_fear_of_empire
							who=ROOT
						}
					}
					remove_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_charles_v_fear_of_empire
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.10.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=1	#AI has a 100 to 1 chance of choosing the abdicate option
			}
	
			set_country_flag=fee_charles_v_abdicate_option
			HAB={
				capital_scope={
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=3
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
				capital_scope={
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=1
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
				random_core_province={
					limit={
						region=south_german_region
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=1
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
				random_core_province={
					limit={
						region=south_german_region
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=3
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
				random_core_province={
					limit={
						region=south_german_region
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=1
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
				random_core_province={
					limit={
						region=south_german_region
					}
					spawn_rebels={
						type=pretender_rebels
						size=1
						leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
					}
				}
	
				if={
					limit={
						BOH={
							is_subject_of_type=personal_union
							has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_pu_austria
						}
					}
					BOH={
						capital_scope={
							spawn_rebels={
								type=pretender_rebels
								size=2
								leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
							}
						}
					}
				}
	
				if={
					limit={
						HUN={
							is_subject_of_type=personal_union
							has_country_flag=fee_charles_v_pu_austria
						}
					}
					HUN={
						capital_scope={
							spawn_rebels={
								type=pretender_rebels
								size=2
								leader="Ferdinand von Habsburg"
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Charles_V_Events.11
		title=FEE_Charles_V_Events.11.T #FEE_Charles_V_Events.T.1_0 "The Habsburg dynasty in Iberia"
		desc=FEE_Charles_V_Events.11.D #FEE_Charles_V_Events.D.1_0 "The son of Maximillian I of Habsburg and Mary of Burgundy, Phillip I would succeed in winning the crown of Castille for the Habsburg dynasty. Already the ruler of the Austrian lowlands through his mother, in 1506 Phillip organized a coup and overthrew the acting king of Spain, Ferdinand II. Though he died mere months later, Philip's legacy would live on through his son Charles, who would come to rule over one of the largest empires in history..."
		picture=NEW_HEIR_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_global_flag=burgundian_succession_crisis
		}
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes		#Triggered on monarch or heir death, whichever comes first.
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Charles_V_Events.11.OPT1 #FEE_Charles_V_Events.1.OPT1_0 "Interesting..."
	
			ROOT={
				capital_scope={	#Puts Spain in the Empire
					set_in_empire=yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.1
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.1.D
		picture=NEW_HEIR_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_heir_flag=child_of_destiny
			NOT={has_country_flag=child_of_destiny_event_1}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=5
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=child_of_destiny_event_1
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.2
					days=730
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.1.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.2
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.2.D
		picture=ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_heir_flag=child_of_destiny
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.3
					days=730
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.2.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
	
			custom_tooltip=cod_your_heirs_abilities_keep_growing
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.3
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.3.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes

			has_heir_flag=child_of_destiny
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.4
					days=730
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.3.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
	
			custom_tooltip=cod_your_heirs_abilities_keep_growing
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.4
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.4.T

			has_heir_flag=child_of_destiny
		}
	
		immediate={

				country_event={
					id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.5
					days=730
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.4.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
	
			custom_tooltip=cod_your_heirs_abilities_keep_growing
		}
	}
	
	country_event={

		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.5.T

		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.6
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.6.T
