	country_event={
		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.10
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.10.T
		desc=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.10.D
		picture=HEIR_EDUCATION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_dlc="Rights of Man"
			has_heir_flag=child_of_destiny
			heir_age=14
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=1
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.10.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
	
			tooltip={
				add_heir_personality=child_of_destiny_personality
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.11
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.11.T
		desc=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.11.D
		picture=HORDE_ON_HORSEBACK_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_ruler_flag=child_of_destiny
			NOT={has_ruler_flag=child_of_destiny_event_2}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_ruler_flag=child_of_destiny_event_2
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.11.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={factor=100}
	
			if={
				limit={
					has_dlc="Rights of Man"
				}
				add_ruler_personality=conqueror_personality
				add_ruler_personality=bold_fighter_personality
			}
			if={
				limit={
					is_monarch_leader=no
				}
				define_ruler_to_general={
					fire=6
					shock=6
					manuever=6
					siege=6
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.100
		title=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.100.T
		desc=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.100.D
		picture=NEW_HEIR_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			NOT={heir_age=1}
			NOT={total_development=150}
			all_countries_including_self={
				NOT={has_heir_flag=child_of_destiny}
				NOT={has_ruler_flag=child_of_destiny}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=1
		}
	
		hidden=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random={
					chance=1
					set_heir_flag=child_of_destiny
					set_ruler_flag=child_of_destiny
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Child_of_Destiny_Events.100.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Cusco_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Cusco_Events.1
		title=FEE_Cusco_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Cusco_Events.1.D
		picture=BIG_BOOK_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=CSU
				tag=INC
			}
			religion=inti
			culture=inca
			has_ruler="Pachacuti"
			NOT={is_year=1450}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=18
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Cusco_Events.1.OPT1 #This year's Situa Raymi will be better than all others!
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=15}
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=5}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Denmark_Events={
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.1
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=DAN
			is_year=1500
			NOT={is_year=1540}
			overlord_of=SWE
			SWE={
				liberty_desire=50
			}
			is_at_war=no
			NOT={
				reverse_has_opinion={
					who=SWE
					value=130
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=180
			modifier={
				factor=0.1
				truce_with=SWE
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_prestige=-5
			SWE={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Denmark_Events.2
					days=2
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-10 republican_tradition=-5}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.2
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.2.D
		picture=BORDER_TENSION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.2.OPT1
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_opinion={
				who=DAN
				modifier=fee_dan_stockholm_bloodbath
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.3
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.3.D
		picture=PRAYING_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=DAN
				AND={
					tag=SCA
					primary_culture=danish
				}
			}
			is_religion_enabled=protestant
			religion=catholic
			NOT={is_year=1530}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=60
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
					}
					set_province_flag=fee_dan_tausen
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.3.OPT1
	
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					has_province_flag=fee_dan_tausen
				}
				change_religion=protestant
				add_province_modifier={
					name=religious_zeal_at_conv #vanilla
					duration=3650
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.3.OPT2
	
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					has_province_flag=fee_dan_tausen
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_dan_uproar_over_hans_tausen
					duration=3650
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.4
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.4.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_CONVERSION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=DAN
			religion=protestant
			is_year=1515
			NOT={is_year=1540}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=96
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				any_owned_province={
					has_province_flag=fee_dan_tausen
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.4.OPT1
	
			define_advisor={
				name="Hans Tausen"
				skill=2
				type=theologian
				discount=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.4.OPT2
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_dan_hans_tausen_preaching
				duration=3650
			}
			if={
				limit={
					senior_union_with=NOR
				}
				NOR={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Denmark_Events.5
						days=30
						random=20
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					senior_union_with=SWE
				}
				SWE={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Denmark_Events.5
						days=30
						random=20
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.5
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.5.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.5.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_CONVERSION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			junior_union_with=DAN
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.5.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_dan_hans_tausen_preaching
				duration=3650
			}
			if={
				limit={
					any_owned_province={
						religion=catholic
					}
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						religion=catholic
					}
					change_religion=protestant
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.6
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.6.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.6.D
		picture=GREAT_BUILDING_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=DAN
				AND={
					tag=SCA
					primary_culture=danish
				}
			}
			is_year=1588
			NOT={is_year=1648}
			ADM=4
			government=monarchy
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=360
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				ADM=5
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				treasury=100
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.6.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_dan_architect_danish_throne
				duration=7300
			}
			capital_scope={
				add_base_tax=1
				add_base_production=1
			}
			if={
				limit={
					tag=SCA
					owns=17
				}
				17={
					add_base_tax=1
					add_base_production=1
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					tag=SCA
					owns=1
				}
				1={
					add_base_tax=1
					add_base_production=1
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					senior_union_with=NOR
				}
				NOR={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Denmark_Events.7
						days=30
						random=10
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					senior_union_with=SWE
				}
				SWE={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Denmark_Events.7
						days=30
						random=10
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.7
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.7.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.7.D
		picture=GREAT_BUILDING_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			junior_union_with=DAN
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.7.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_dan_architect_danish_throne
				duration=7300
			}
			capital_scope={
				add_base_tax=1
				add_base_production=1
			}
			if={
				limit={
					owns_core_province=24
				}
				24={
					add_base_tax=1
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					owns_core_province=6
				}
				6={
					add_base_tax=1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.8
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.8.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.8.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			tag=DAN
			government=monarchy
			NOT={has_ruler_flag=fee_dan_danish_elective}
			NOT={
				has_country_modifier=fee_dan_danish_absolutism
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=48
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_ruler_flag=fee_dan_danish_elective
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.8.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=98
			}
	
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=10 republican_tradition=5}
			add_adm_power=-15
			add_dip_power=-15
			add_mil_power=-15
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					is_capital=no
				}
				add_local_autonomy=15
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.8.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=2
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					is_capital=no
				}
				noble_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.9
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.9.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.9.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=DAN
				AND={
					tag=SCA
					primary_culture=danish
				}
			}
			is_year=1660
			government=monarchy
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=180
			modifier={
				factor=0.7
				truce_with=SWE
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				ADM=5
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				stability=2
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.9.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_dan_danish_absolutism
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.10
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.10.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.10.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		hidden=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=DAN
				tag=SCA
			}
			has_country_modifier=fee_dan_danish_absolutism
			NOT={
				government=monarchy
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=10
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				remove_country_modifier=fee_dan_danish_absolutism
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.10.OPT1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.11
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.11.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.11.D
		picture=LIBERUM_VETO_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=SCA
			has_ruler_flag=fee_danish_elective
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=1
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Denmark_Events.11.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			add_adm_power=10
			add_dip_power=10
			add_mil_power=10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Denmark_Events.12
		title=FEE_Denmark_Events.12.T
		desc=FEE_Denmark_Events.12.D
		picture=KING_SICK_IN_BED_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=DAN
				AND={
					tag=SCA
					primary_culture=danish
				}
			}
			government=monarchy
			is_subject=no
			is_year=1750
			NOT={is_year=1790}
			OR={
				has_any_disaster=no
				has_disaster=aspiration_for_liberty
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=360
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				NOT={
					ADM=3
				}
			}

				NOT={
					DIP=3
				}

				}

				has_disaster=aspiration_for_liberty

						ADM=5
						DIP=5
						MIL=5
					}
				}
			}

			add_mil_power=-20

FEE_Diseases_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Diseases_Events.1
		title=FEE_Diseases_Events.1.T
		desc={
			trigger={
				121={
					OR={
						controller={
							culture_group=french
						}
						owner={
							culture_group=french
						}
					}
				}
			}
			desc=FEE_Diseases_Events.1.D_French
		}
		desc={
			trigger={
				121={
					OR={
						controller={
							num_of_colonies=1
						}
						owner={
							num_of_colonies=1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			desc=FEE_Diseases_Events.1.D_Colonial
		}
		picture=PLAGUE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1440
			NOT={is_year=1750}
			121={
				owned_by=ROOT
			}
			any_country={
				OR={
					culture_group=french
					num_of_colonies=1
				}
				OR={
					controls=121
					owns=121
					121={
						sieged_by=PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=1
		}
	
		goto=121
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			capital_scope={
				continent=europe
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Diseases_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			121={
				add_base_tax=-2
				add_base_production=-2
				add_base_manpower=-2
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_syphilis_outbreak
					duration=3650
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip=FEE_SYPHILIS_DISEASE_TT
			hidden_effect={
				116={
					province_event={
						id=FEE_Diseases_Events.2
						days=60
						random=15
					}
				}
				4730={
					province_event={
						id=FEE_Diseases_Events.2
						days=60
						random=15
					}
				}
				115={
					province_event={
						id=FEE_Diseases_Events.2
						days=60
						random=15
					}
				}
				113={
					province_event={
						id=FEE_Diseases_Events.2
						days=60
						random=15
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	province_event={
		id=FEE_Diseases_Events.2
		title=FEE_Diseases_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Diseases_Events.2.D
		picture=PLAGUE_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		goto=ROOT
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Diseases_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_base_tax=-1
			add_base_production=-1
			add_base_manpower=-1
			add_province_modifier={
				name=fee_syphilis_outbreak
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	}
	

}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.1
		title=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.1.D
		picture=ELECTION_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1685
			tag=FRA
			FRA={
				OR={
					has_country_modifier=edict_de_nantes
					has_country_flag=revoked_the_edict_of_nantes
				}
			}
			OR={
				exists=PRU
				exists=BRA
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=30
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			if={
				limit={
					has_country_modifier=edict_de_nantes
				}
				remove_country_modifier=edict_de_nantes
				set_country_flag=revoked_the_edict_of_nantes
			}
			custom_tooltip=fee_edict_potsdam_hugenots_outside_tt
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						exists=PRU
					}
					PRU={
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.2
							days=1
						}
					}
				}
				else={
					BRA={
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.2
							days=1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
	
			add_stability=-2
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.2
		title=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.2.D
		picture=ELECTION_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.2
			set_country_flag=fee_edict_potsdam_huguenots_invited
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
	
			add_prestige=-10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.3
		title=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.3.D
		picture=ELECTION_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=FRA
			OR={
				PRU={
					has_country_flag=fee_edict_potsdam_huguenots_invited
				}
				BRA={
					has_country_flag=fee_edict_potsdam_huguenots_invited
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=365
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				export_to_variable={
					which=5_percent_of_development
					value=trigger_value_total_development
				}
				multiply_variable={
					which=5_percent_of_development
					value=0.05
				}
				set_variable={
					which=5_percent_of_development_truncated
					which=5_percent_of_development
				}
				divide_variable={
					which=5_percent_of_development_truncated
					value=1000
				}
				multiply_variable={
					which=5_percent_of_development_truncated
					value=1000
				}
				if={
					limit={
						exists=PRU
					}
					PRU={
						set_variable={
							which=5_percent_of_development_truncated
							which=PREV
						}
					}
				}
				else={
					BRA={
						set_variable={
							which=5_percent_of_development_truncated
							which=PREV
						}
					}
				}
				while={
					limit={
						check_variable={
							which=5_percent_of_development
							value=1
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							region=france_region
							development=4
						}
						if={
							limit={
								base_tax=2
							}
							add_base_tax=-1
						}
						else_if={
							limit={
								base_production=2
							}
							add_base_production=-1
						}
						else={
							add_base_manpower=-1
						}
					}
					subtract_variable={
						which=5_percent_of_development
						value=1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.3.OPT1
	
			custom_tooltip=fee_edict_potsdam_loses_5_percent_development_for_France_tt
			set_country_flag=huguenots_left
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.4
		title=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.4.D
		picture=ELECTION_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			if={
				limit={
					exists=PRU
				}
				tag=PRU
			}
			else={
				tag=BRA
			}
			FRA={
				has_country_flag=huguenots_left
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=365
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_variable={
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
					which=5_percent_of_development_truncated
				}
				multiply_variable={
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
					value=0.5
				}
				divide_variable={
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
					value=1000
				}
				multiply_variable={
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
					value=1000
				}
				set_variable={
					which=huguenots_arrived_in_capital
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
				}
				set_variable={
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_second_half
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
				}
				capital_scope={
					export_to_variable={
						variable_name=PRU_BRA_capital_tax
						value=trigger_value_base_tax
					}
					export_to_variable={
						variable_name=PRU_BRA_capital_production
						value=trigger_value_base_production
					}
					export_to_variable={
						variable_name=PRU_BRA_capital_manpower
						value=trigger_value_base_manpower
					}
				}
				while={
					limit={
						check_variable={
							which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_second_half
							value=1
						}
					}
					random_country={
						limit={
							is_part_of_hre=yes
							OR={
								religion=protestant
								religion=reformed
							}
							if={
								limit={
									exists=PRU
								}
								NOT={
									total_development=PRU
								}
							}
							else={
								NOT={
									total_development=BRA
								}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.5
							days=30
						}
					}
					subtract_variable={
						which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_second_half
						value=1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.4.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=-1
			custom_tooltip=fee_edict_potsdam_arrival_hugenots_tt
			while={
				limit={
					check_variable={
						which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
						value=1
					}
				}
				capital_scope={
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={
								AND={
									check_variable={
										which=PRU_BRA_capital_tax
										which=PRU_BRA_capital_production
									}
									check_variable={
										which=PRU_BRA_capital_tax
										which=PRU_BRA_capital_production
									}
								}
							}
						}
						add_base_tax=1
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							NOT={
								check_variable={
									which=PRU_BRA_capital_production
									which=PRU_BRA_capital_manpower
								}
							}
						}
						add_base_production=1
					}
					else={
						add_base_manpower=1
					}
					export_to_variable={
						which=PRU_BRA_capital_tax
						value=trigger_value_base_tax
					}
					export_to_variable={
						which=PRU_BRA_capital_production
						value=trigger_value_base_production
					}
					export_to_variable={
						which=PRU_BRA_capital_manpower
						value=trigger_value_base_manpower
					}
				}
				subtract_variable={
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
					value=1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.4.OPT2
			add_prestige=-10
			while={
				limit={
					check_variable={
						which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
						value=1
					}
				}
				random_country={
					limit={
						is_part_of_hre=yes
						OR={
							religion=protestant
							religion=reformed
						}
						if={
							limit={
								exists=PRU
							}
							NOT={
								total_development=PRU
							}
						}
						else={
							NOT={
								total_development=BRA
							}
						}
					}
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.5
						days=30
					}
				}
				subtract_variable={
					which=50_percent_of_huguenots_dissidents_first_half
					value=1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.5
		title=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.5.T
		desc=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.5.D
		picture=ELECTION_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=no
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				capital_scope={
					export_to_variable={
						variable_name=CURRENT_capital_tax
						value=trigger_value_base_tax
					}
					export_to_variable={
						variable_name=CURRENT_capital_production
						value=trigger_value_base_production
					}
					export_to_variable={
						variable_name=CURRENT_capital_manpower
						value=trigger_value_base_manpower
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.5.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=75
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			add_years_of_income=-0.05
			capital_scope={
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							AND={
								check_variable={
									which=CURRENT_capital_tax
									which=CURRENT_capital_production
								}
								check_variable={
									which=CURRENT_capital_tax
									which=CURRENT_capital_production
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_base_tax=1
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=CURRENT_capital_production
								which=CURRENT_capital_manpower
							}
						}
					}
					add_base_production=1
				}
				else={
					add_base_manpower=1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Edict_Of_Potsdam_Events.5.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
			}
	
			add_prestige=-1
		}
	}
}

		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=ENG
				tag=GBR
			}
			has_institution=renaissance
			stability=1
			is_year=1500
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_England_Great_Britain_Events.1.OPT1

				type=natural_scientist
				name="Francis Bacon"

				cost_multiplier=0.25
			}

				name=fee_eng_gbr_scientific_method
				duration=7300
			}
		}
	}

			}

					culture=english
				}
				change_religion=reformed

				}
				change_religion=reformed

					culture=english

			name=FEE_England_Great_Britain_Events.7.OPT2

			}

	country_event={

		title=FEE_England_Great_Britain_Events.19.T
		desc=FEE_England_Great_Britain_Events.19.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture

						is_rival=ROOT
					}
				}
				SPA={
					is_rival=ROOT
				}
			}
			ROOT={
				is_part_of_hre=no
				NOT={dynasty="von Habsburg"}
				NOT={junior_union_with=SPA}
			}
			FRA={
				is_part_of_hre=no
				NOT={dynasty="von Habsburg"}
				NOT={junior_union_with=SPA}
			}
			SPA={
				OR={
					NOT={	junior_union_with=ROOT}
					NOT={junior_union_with=FRA}
				}
			}
			is_year=1490
			NOT={is_year=1560}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_England_Great_Britain_Events.19.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=0.2
			if={
				limit={
					FRA={
						historical_rival_with=ROOT
					}
				}
				FRA={
					remove_historical_rival=ROOT
				}
				remove_historical_rival=FRA
			}
			else={
				FRA={
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_eng_gbr_field_of_the_cloth_of_gold
					}
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=FRA
					modifier=fee_eng_gbr_field_of_the_cloth_of_gold
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_England_Great_Britain_Events.19.OPT2
	
			FRA={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_eng_gbr_rejected_alliance
				}
			}
			add_prestige=-10
		}
	}

FEE_Enlightenment_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.1
		title=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.1.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_institution=enlightenment
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_had_start_of_enlightenment}
			NOT={is_year=1790}
			has_first_revolution_started=no
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			set_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_had_start_of_enlightenment
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.1.OPT1
	
			set_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
			custom_tooltip=fee_enlightenment_development_age_enlightenment_tt
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.2
		title=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.2.D
		picture=ELECTION_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
			OR={
				NOT={has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag_coffee_house_timer}
				had_country_flag={
					flag=fee_enlightenment_flag_coffee_house_timer
					days=3650
				}
			}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_strong_censorship}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=600
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag_coffee_house_timer
				clr_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag_coffee_house_timer
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.2.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_enlightenment_coffee_house
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.2.OPT2
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.3
		title=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.3.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
			government=dictatorship
			NOT={has_ruler_flag=fee_enlightened_absolutism_flag}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=480
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				ADM=4
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				ADM=6
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				has_idea_group=innovativeness_ideas
			}

				factor=0.8
				has_idea_group=administrative_ideas
			}
		}

			hidden_effect={
				set_ruler_flag=fee_enlightened_absolutism_flag
			}
		}

			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
			}

				name=fee_enlightenment_not_enlightened_ruler
				duration=-1
			}
		}

			ai_chance={
				factor=75
			}
	
			add_ruler_modifier={
				name=fee_enlightenment_enlightened_ruler
				duration=-1
			}

		id=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.20
		title=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.20.T
		desc=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.20.D
		picture=UNIVERSITY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1760
			has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=300
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.20.OPT1
	
			clr_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.21
		title=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.21.T
		desc=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.21.D
		picture=REVOLUTION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1725
			has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
			has_first_revolution_started=yes
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=3
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.21.OPT1
	
			add_prestige=-5
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.22
		title=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.22.T
		desc=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.22.D
		picture=THEATRE_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=800
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.22.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			random_neighbor_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_enlightenment_popular_literary_work
				}
				reverse_add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_enlightenment_popular_literary_work
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.22.OPT2
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_enlightenment_literary_work_presented
				duration=1825
			}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.23
		title=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.23.T
		desc=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.23.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag
			NOT={
				OR={
					has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag_academia_adm
					has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag_academia_dip
					has_country_flag=fee_enlightenment_flag_academia_mil
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=800
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.23.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_enlightenment_academia_adm
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.23.OPT2
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_enlightenment_academia_dip
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Enlightenment_Events.23.OPT3
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_enlightenment_academia_mil
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Fairs_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.1
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.1.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			ai=no
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_trading_fairs_enabled}
			NOT={is_institution_enabled=global_trade}
			NOT={is_year=1446}
		}
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			ai=no
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.1.OPT1
	
			custom_tooltip=FEE_FAIRS_STARTING_TT
			set_global_flag=fee_trading_fairs_enabled
			hidden_effect={
				every_province={
					limit={province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=1}
					set_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_eligible
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.1.OPT2
	
			custom_tooltip=FEE_FAIRS_DISABLE_TT
			clr_global_flag=fee_trading_fairs_enabled
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.2.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		hidden=yes
	
		trigger={
			NOT={is_institution_enabled=global_trade}
			has_global_flag=fee_trading_fairs_enabled
			OR={
				had_country_flag={
					flag=fee_trading_fair_started
					days=5475
				}
				NOT={has_country_flag=fee_trading_fair_started}
			}
			any_owned_province={
				province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=1
				OR={
					NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started}
					had_province_flag={
						flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
						days=7300
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=1
						OR={
							NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started}
							had_province_flag={
								flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
								days=5475
							}
						}
					}
					set_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
					save_event_target_as=event_target_fee_fair_province
					owner={
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.3
							days=30
						}
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag=fee_trading_fair_started
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.2.OPT1
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_trading_fair_started
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.3
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.3.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		goto=event_target_fee_fair_province
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			custom_tooltip=FEE_FAIRS_CHOSE_PROVINCE_TT
			country_event={
				id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7
				days=1825
			}
			hidden_effect={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000
					days=60
					random=15
				}
			}
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
					duration=1825
				}
				hidden_effect={
					set_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
					set_variable={
						which=feeTradingFairLevel
						value=0
					}
					if={
						limit={
							has_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_eligible
							NOT={has_province_flag=fee_first_trading_fair}
							owner={
								NOT={has_country_flag=fee_first_trading_fair_country}
							}
						}
						set_province_flag=fee_first_trading_fair
						owner={
							set_country_flag=fee_first_trading_fair_country
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.4
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.4.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.4.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			country_event={
				id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.4.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.5.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.5.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.5.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			country_event={
				id=FEE_Fairs_Events.4
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.5.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.6
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.6.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.6.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_institution_enabled=global_trade
			has_global_flag=fee_trading_fairs_enabled
		}
	
		major=yes
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=1
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.6.OPT1
	
			custom_tooltip=FEE_ORIGIN_TRADING_FAIRS_TT
			tooltip={
				random_province={
					limit={
						has_province_flag=fee_first_trading_fair
						owner={has_country_flag=fee_first_trading_fair_country}
						NOT={has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_origin}
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier={
						name=fee_trading_fair_origin
						duration=-1
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				every_province={
					limit={
						has_province_flag=fee_first_trading_fair
						owner={
							has_country_flag=fee_first_trading_fair_country
							NOT={
								any_owned_province={
									has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_origin
								}
							}
						}
						NOT={has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_origin}
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier={
						name=fee_trading_fair_origin
						duration=-1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.7.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.7.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		goto=event_target_fee_fair_province
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier}
						}
						set_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=-1000
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=2}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=10
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={full_idea_group=trade_ideas}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=20
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={trade_ideas=3}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=10
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={trade_ideas=1}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=5
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={DIP=5}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=10
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={
								NOT={DIP=1}
							}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=-10
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={monthly_dip=12}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=15
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={
								NOT={monthly_dip=6}
							}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=-15
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={prosperity=50}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=5
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={devastation=25}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=-5
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={trader=3}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=10
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={trader=2}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=6
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={trader=1}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=3
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={is_trade_league_leader=yes}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=10
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={
								num_of_owned_provinces_with={
									value=3
									province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=3
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=8
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={
								num_of_owned_provinces_with={
									value=3
									province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=2
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=7
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={
								num_of_owned_provinces_with={
									value=2
									province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=3
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=8
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							owner={
								num_of_owned_provinces_with={
									value=2
									province_has_center_of_trade_of_level=2
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable={
							which=feeTradingFairLevel
							value=5
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.7.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=-900
							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip=FEE_FAIR_STARTED_CHANGED_OWNER_TT
					owner={add_splendor=1}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=-95
							}
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={
								NOT={DIP=1}
							}
						}
						add_base_production=-2
					}
					else={add_base_production=-1}
				}
				else_if={#Devastation
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=-65
							}
						}
					}
					add_devastation=33
				}
				else_if={#Loss Mercantilism
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=-35
							}
						}
					}
					owner={
						if={
							limit={mercantilism=3}
							add_mercantilism=-3
						}
						else={
							add_dip_power=-25
						}
					}
				}
				else_if={#Loss Income
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=-15
							}
						}
					}
					owner={add_years_of_income=-0.083}
				}
				else_if={#Loss Mana
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=0
							}
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={DIP=1}
						}
						owner={
							add_dip_power=-25
						}
					}
					else={
						owner={
							add_dip_power=-50
						}
					}
				}
				else_if={#Gain Mana
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=15
							}
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							owner={DIP=6}
						}
						owner={
							add_dip_power=50
						}
					}
					else={
						owner={
							add_dip_power=25
						}
					}
				}
				else_if={#Gain Mercantilism
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=35
							}
						}
					}
					owner={
						add_mercantilism=3
					}
				}
				else_if={#Gain Income
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=65
							}
						}
					}
					owner={
						add_years_of_income=0.083
					}
				}
				else_if={#Gain Trader
					limit={
						NOT={
							check_variable={
								which=feeTradingFairLevel
								value=95
							}
						}
					}
					owner={
						define_advisor={
							type=trader
							skill=2
							cost_multiplier=0.75
							culture=ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				else={#Gain Development
					if={
						limit={
							owner={DIP=6}
						}
						add_base_production=2
					}
					else={add_base_production=1}
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_invitation
	
				event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_goes_to_fair
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_does_not_go_to_fair
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_accepted
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_refused
	
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_accepted
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_repulsed
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_fire
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_furtune_teller
					clr_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_dealed_nomad
	
					clr_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_preparation
					clr_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_personal
					if={
						limit={
							has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
						}
						remove_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
					}
					set_variable={
						which=feeTradingFairLevel
						value=0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		hidden=yes
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			any_owned_province={
				has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_list={
					13={
						trigger={
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_goes_to_fair}
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_does_not_go_to_fair}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.3000
							days=365
							random=30
						}
					}
					13={
						trigger={
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
								has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
								had_province_flag={
									flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
									days=1095
								}
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_accepted}
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_repulsed}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5000
							days=365
							random=30
						}
					}
					13={
						trigger={
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
								had_province_flag={
									flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
									days=90
								}
								has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_accepted
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_fire}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5001
							days=180
							random=30
						}
					}
					13={
						trigger={
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_almighty_protection}
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_solemn_hymn}
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_angelic_blessing}
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_kiss_luck}
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_ruinous_powers}
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_demonic_embrace}
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_ancient_curse}
							NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_witch_eye}
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
								has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_accepted
								has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_goes_to_fair
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_furtune_teller}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5002
							days=180
							random=30
						}
					}
					13={
						trigger={
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
								had_province_flag={
									flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_accepted
									days=365
								}
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_dealed_nomad}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5020
							days=365
							random=30
						}
					}
					13={
						trigger={
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_accepted}
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_refused}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.6000
							days=270
							random=30
						}
					}
					13={
						trigger={
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
								NOT={current_age=age_of_revolutions}
								NOT={current_age=age_of_absolutism}
								NOT={current_age=age_of_reformation}
								had_province_flag={
									flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
									days=1095
								}
								NOT={has_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_preparation}
							}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7000
							days=90
							random=15
						}
					}
					13={
						trigger={
							event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
								any_owned_province={
									has_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_preparation
								}
							}
							NOT={has_country_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_invitation}
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7001
							days=270
							random=30
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000.OPT1
		}

		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.3000
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.3000.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.3000.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_goes_to_fair}
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_does_not_go_to_fair}
			}
		}
	
		goto=event_target_fee_fair_province
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.3000.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				set_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_goes_to_fair
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=5
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.3000.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				set_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_ruler_does_not_go_to_fair
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=-5
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000
					days=90
					random=15
				}
			}
		}

		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.5020.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
				had_province_flag={
					flag=fee_province_trading_fair_nomad_accepted
					days=365
				}
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_dealed_nomad}
			}
		}
	
		goto=event_target_fee_fair_province
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.5020.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.083
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				add_development_third_monarch_skill_fee=yes
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=10
				}
				hidden_effect={
					change_variable={
						which=feeNomadCaravan
						value=10
					}
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5021
						days=365
						random=30
					}
					set_province_flag=fee_nomad_caravan_in
					clr_province_flag=fee_nomad_fired_between_fairs
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.5020.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_mil_power=75
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=-15
				}
				set_province_flag=fee_nomad_restored
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
					set_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_dealed_nomad
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000
					days=90
					random=15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.5021
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.5021.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.5021.D
		picture=REVOLT_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			any_owned_province={
				NOT={has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier}
				has_province_flag=fee_nomad_caravan_in
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_nomad_restored}
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_nomad_fired_between_fairs}
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier}
						has_province_flag=fee_nomad_caravan_in
						NOT={has_province_flag=fee_nomad_restored}
						NOT={has_province_flag=fee_nomad_fired_between_fairs}
					}
					save_event_target_as=event_target_fee_nomad_caravan_province
				}
			}
		}
	
		goto=event_target_fee_nomad_caravan_province
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.5021.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			event_target_event_target_fee_nomad_caravan_province={
				if={
					limit={
						check_variable={
							which=feeNomadCaravan
							value=10
						}
					}
					add_devastation=10
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						check_variable={
							which=feeNomadCaravan
							value=25
						}
					}
					add_devastation=33
					add_base_tax=-1
					add_base_production=-1
					add_base_manpower=-1
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						check_variable={
							which=feeNomadCaravan
							value=50
						}
					}
					add_devastation=50
					add_base_tax=-3
					add_base_production=-3
					add_base_manpower=-3
					owner={
						add_stability=-1
						add_adm_power=-50
						add_dip_power=-50
						add_mil_power=-50
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				event_target_event_target_fee_nomad_caravan_province={
					set_province_flag=fee_nomad_fired_between_fairs
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.6000
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.6000.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.6000.D
		picture=CARAVAN_EVENT_Picture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_accepted}
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_refused}
			}
		}

			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.6000.OPT1

				15={change_innovativeness=2}
				85={add_adm_power=25}
			}
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				set_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_accepted
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=10
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.6000.OPT2
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.0416 #half month of income
			define_advisor={
				type=artist
				skill=2
				cost_multiplier=0.50
			}
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				set_province_flag=fee_province_trading_fair_famous_artist_refused
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=-10
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000
					days=90
					random=15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7000
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.7000.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.7000.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				has_province_modifier=fee_trading_fair_province_modifier
				NOT={current_age=age_of_revolutions}
				NOT={current_age=age_of_absolutism}
				NOT={current_age=age_of_reformation}
				had_province_flag={
					flag=fee_province_trading_fair_started
					days=1095
				}
				NOT={has_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_preparation}
			}
		}
	
		goto=event_target_fee_fair_province
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.7000.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.332
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=5 republican_tradition=5}
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=5
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.7000.OPT2
	
			add_prestige=-5
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=-5
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
					set_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_preparation
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000
					days=90
					random=15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7001
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.7001.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.7001.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				has_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_preparation
			}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_invitation}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.7001.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
				modifier={
					factor=0
					ai=yes
				}
			}
	
			event_target_event_target_fee_fair_province={
				change_variable={
					which=feeTradingFairLevel
					value=5
				}
				set_province_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_personal
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.7001.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
			}
	
			every_neighbor_country={
				limit={
					NOT={war_with=ROOT}
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7002
					days=30
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_trading_fair_banquet_invitation
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.2000
					days=90
					random=15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7002
		title=FEE_Fairs_Events.7002.T
		desc=FEE_Fairs_Events.7002.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.7002.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
				modifier={
					factor=2
					FROM={
						alliance_with=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.5
					FROM={
						marriage_with=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=2
					FROM={
						is_subject_of=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.25
					FROM={
						has_opinion={
							who=ROOT
							value=75
						}
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.25
					FROM={
						religion=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.125
					FROM={
						culture_group=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.125
					FROM={
						reverse_has_opinion={
							who=ROOT
							value=125
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_fairs_accepted_invitation
			}
			FROM={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_fairs_accepted_invitation
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7003
					days=30
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Fairs_Events.7002.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
				modifier={
					factor=2
					FROM={
						is_rival=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.5
					FROM={
						is_enemy=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.25
					FROM={
						NOT={
							has_opinion={
								who=ROOT
								value=-50
							}
						}
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.25
					FROM={
						NOT={religion=ROOT}
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=1.125
					FROM={
						NOT={culture_group=ROOT}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_fairs_declined_invitation
			}
			FROM={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_fairs_declined_invitation
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Fairs_Events.7004
					days=30
				}
			}
		}
	}

FEE_France_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_France_Events.101
		title=FEE_France_Events.101.T
		desc=FEE_France_Events.101.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		hidden=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_in_war={
				attacker_leader=ENG
				defender_leader=FRA
				casus_belli=cb_restore_personal_union
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			set_global_flag=fee_surrender_main
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_France_Events.101.OPT1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_France_Events.1
		title=FEE_France_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_France_Events.1.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			NOT={is_year=1454}
			tag=FRA
			is_at_war=no
			calc_true_if={
				amount=2
				all_subject_country={
					capital_scope={
						region=france_region
					}
				}
			}
			has_estate_privilege=estate_nobles_french_strong_duchies
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_global_flag=fee_french_feudalism_hundred_years_war
			}
		}
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=30
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_France_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
	
			set_country_flag=french_centralization
			add_adm_power=-100
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_france_administrative_unificaiton
				duration=18250
			}
			every_subject_country={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_France_Events.4
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_France_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
	
			set_country_flag=french_centralization
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_france_feudal_militaries
				duration=18250
			}
			if={
				limit={
					is_expanded_mod_active={mod=governments}
				}
				set_estate_privilege=estate_nobles_blood_tax
			}
			else={
				if={
					limit={
						num_of_subjects=1
					}
					add_country_modifier={
						name=fee_france_blood_tax
						duration=18250
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={num_of_subjects=2}
					add_country_modifier={
						name=fee_france_blood_tax2
						duration=18250
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={num_of_subjects=3}
					add_country_modifier={
						name=fee_france_blood_tax3
						duration=18250
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={num_of_subjects=4}
					add_country_modifier={
						name=fee_france_blood_tax4
						duration=18250
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={num_of_subjects=5}
					add_country_modifier={
						name=fee_france_blood_tax5
						duration=18250
					}
				}
			}
			every_subject_country={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_France_Events.4
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_France_Events.1.OPT3
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
	
			set_country_flag=french_decentralization
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_france_decentralization
				duration=18250
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_France_Events.2
		title=FEE_France_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_France_Events.2.D
		picture=UNIVERSITY_eventPicture

			has_country_flag=french_centralization

				factor=33

			}

			name=FEE_France_Events.2.OPT2

				factor=33

				factor=33

						ruler_has_personality=just_personality
						ruler_has_personality=lawgiver_personality
						ruler_has_personality=benevolent_personality
						ruler_has_personality=scholar_personality
					}
				}
				else={
					OR={
						influence_ideas=3
						diplomatic_ideas=3
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes

				name=fee_france_friendly_legal_class
				duration=14600
			}

						}
					}
				}

						share=-5
					}

						estate=estate_nobles
						desc=fee_nobles_angry
						loyalty=-10
						duration=7300
					}

						estate=estate_nobles

				name=fee_france_independence_asserted
				duration=7300
			}

					limit={

					}
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT

					}
					reverse_add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_france_independence_asserted_opinion
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_France_Events.6.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
			overlord={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_france_subjucated_overlord
				}
				reverse_add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_france_subjucated_overlord
				}
				every_subject_country={
					limit={
						NOT={tag=ROOT}
					}
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_france_subjucated
					}
					reverse_add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_france_subjucated
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	}

				}
			}

				add_permanent_claim=BRG
			}
			remove_country_modifier=fee_gel_loot_pay
			clr_global_flag=fee_gel_guelders_wars_start

			name=FEE_Gelre_Events.12.OPT3

				factor=33
			}

				}

			}
			remove_country_modifier=fee_gel_loot_pay
			clr_global_flag=fee_gel_guelders_wars_start
		}
	}

FEE_heir_education={
	
	
	
	country_event={
		id=heir_education.2
		title=heir_education.2.T
		desc=heir_education.2.D
		picture=HEIR_EDUCATION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_heir=yes
			has_heir_flag=in_education_but_not_learning
			NOT={
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_artist
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_natural_scientist
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_inquisitor
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_trader
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_spymaster
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_colonial_governor
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_army_reformer
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_fortification_expert
				has_heir_flag=educated_by_grand_captain
			}
			NOT={heir_age=14}
			advisor=artist
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=48
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				legitimacy=75
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.2
				NOT={legitimacy=50}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.5
				NOT={prestige=50}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.5
				artist=3
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.7
				artist=2
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=heir_education.2.OPT1
			set_heir_flag=educated_by_artist
			custom_tooltip=heir_is_being_educated_by_artist
			add_adm_power=-25
		}
	
		option={
			name=heir_education.2.OPT2
			add_prestige=-5
		}

		}

			hidden_effect={
			clr_heir_flag=in_education_excellent
			clr_heir_flag=in_education_good
			clr_heir_flag=in_education_average
			clr_heir_flag=in_education_but_not_learning}

						}

						}

							days=1
						}
					}

							days=1
						}
					}
					15={
						country_event={
							id=heir_education.105 #Heir plus 3 mil but minus 1 adm AKA Master of the Sword
							days=1
						}
					}
					13={
						country_event={
							id=heir_education.106 #Heir plus 2 adm and 2 dip AKA Pragmatic Jury
							days=1
						}
					}
					5={

							days=1
						}
					}
					10={
						country_event={
							id=heir_education.110 #Heir plus 1 adm and 1 mil but minus 1 dip AKA Pious Zealot
							days=1
						}
					}
					10={
						country_event={
							id=heir_education.111 #Heir plus 2 adm AKA Curious Skeptic
							days=1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=heir_education.14
		title=heir_education.14.T
		desc=heir_education.14.D
		picture=HEIR_EDUCATION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_heir=yes
			has_heir_flag=in_education_but_not_learning
			heir_age=14

			days=1
		}

			clr_heir_flag=in_education_but_not_learning}

			name=heir_education.14.OPT1
				hidden_effect={

	country_event={
		id=heir_education.200
		title=heir_education.200.T
		desc=heir_education.200.D
		picture=HEIR_EDUCATION_eventPicture
	
		immediate={set_heir_flag=Extra_Lessons_Fired}
		trigger={
			heir_age=7
			NOT={heir_age=14}
			OR={
				has_heir_flag=in_education_excellent
				has_heir_flag=in_education_good
				has_heir_flag=in_education_average
			}
			NOT={
				OR={
					has_heir_flag=more_homework
					has_heir_flag=more_etiquette
					has_heir_flag=more_fencing
					has_heir_flag=extra_lessons_declined
					has_heir_flag=Extra_Lessons_Fired
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=360
		}
	
		option={
			name=heir_education.200.OPT1	#Homework!
			if={
				limit={
					heir_adm=6
				}
				add_adm_power=100
			}
			else={
				change_heir_adm=1
			}
			set_heir_flag=more_homework
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
		}
	
		option={
			name=heir_education.200.OPT2	#Etiquette!
			if={
				limit={
					heir_dip=6
				}
				add_dip_power=100
			}
			else={
				change_heir_dip=1
			}
			set_heir_flag=more_etiquette
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
		}
	
		option={
			name=heir_education.200.OPT3	#Fencing!
			if={
				limit={
					heir_mil=6
				}
				add_mil_power=100
			}
			else={
				change_heir_mil=1
			}
			set_heir_flag=more_fencing
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
		}
	
		option={
			name=heir_education.200.e	#Leave them some space.
			set_heir_flag=extra_lessons_declined
		}
	}

}
FEE_Hesse_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Hesse_Events.1
		title=FEE_Hesse_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Hesse_Events.1.D
		picture=LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=HES
				was_tag=HES
				AND={
					tag=WES
					HES={exists=no}
				}
			}
			is_year=1630
			is_at_war=no
			army_size=10
			any_country={
				OR={
					capital_scope={region=north_german_region}
					capital_scope={region=south_german_region}
					capital_scope={region=france_region}
					capital_scope={region=scandinavia_region}
					capital_scope={region=low_countries_region}
					capital_scope={region=italy_region}
					capital_scope={region=iberia_region}
				}
				is_at_war=yes
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=540
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				has_idea_group=administrative_ideas
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				MIL=4
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.9
				has_idea_group=quality_ideas
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Hesse_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=0.25
			add_manpower=-3
			add_army_tradition=5.0
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Hesse_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_mil_power=25
		}
	}
}
FEE_Historical_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Historical_Events.1
		title=FEE_Historical_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Historical_Events.1.D
		picture=FAMINE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			capital_scope={
				OR={
					continent=europe
					continent=asia
					continent=north_america
				}
			}
			is_year=1816
			is_month=2
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=1
		}
	
		major=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Historical_Events.1.OPT1
			change_price={
				trade_goods=grain
				key=fee_year_without_summer
				value=1
				duration=24
			}
			change_price={
				trade_goods=livestock
				key=fee_year_without_summer
				value=0.5
				duration=24
			}
			custom_tooltip=YEAR_WITHOUT_SUMMER_TT
			tooltip={
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_year_without_summer_country
					duration=360
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				every_country={
					limit={
						capital_scope={
							OR={
								continent=europe
								continent=asia
								continent=north_america
							}
						}
					}
					add_country_modifier={
						name=fee_year_without_summer_country
						duration=360
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_HRE_Minor_Events={
	country_event={
		id=FEE_HRE_Minors.1
		title=FEE_HRE_Minors.1.T
		desc=FEE_HRE_Minors.1.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			is_year=1485
			NOT={
				is_year=1530
			}
			owns_core_province=67
			or={
				67={
					is_prosperous=yes
				}
				stability=2
			}
			NOT={num_of_loans=1}
			NOT={
				any_owned_province={
					unrest=1
				}
			}
		}
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=300
			modifier={
				factor=0.5
				or={
					has_estate_privilege=estate_burghers_patronage_of_the_arts
					has_estate_privilege=estate_vaisyas_patronage_of_the_arts				# im adding this 90% so I remember that the same privledge can exist between many estates
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				religious_ideas=4
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_HRE_Minors.1.OPT1
			define_advisor={
				type=artist
				name="Albrecht Durer"
				skill=2
				culture=franconian
				cost_multiplier=0.25
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_HRE_Minor_Durer
				duration=7300
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_HRE_Minors.2
		title=FEE_HRE_Minors.2.T
		desc=FEE_HRE_Minors.2.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			is_elector=yes
			is_emperor=no
			NOT={
				religion=hussite
			}
			has_institution=renaissance
		}
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=240
			modifier={
				factor=0.6
				has_idea_group=humanist_ideas
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_HRE_Minors.2.OPT1
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_HRE_Minor_Tolerance_of_Jews
				duration=18250
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_HRE_Minors.2.OPT2
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_HRE_Minor_Expulsion_of_Jews
				duration=7300
			}
			add_inflation=3
			add_years_of_income=0.25
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_HRE_Minors.2.OPT3
			trigger={
				OR={
					has_idea_group=humanist_ideas
					ruler_has_personality=tolerant_personality
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					num_of_owned_provinces_with={
						value=2
					}
				}
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						is_capital=no
					}
					change_religion=jewish
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_HRE_Minor_Jewish_Refuge
				duration=18250
			}
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_HRE_Minors.3
		title=FEE_HRE_Minors.3.T
		desc=FEE_HRE_Minors.3.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			is_emperor=Yes
			religion=catholic
			any_elector={
				religion=protestant
			}
			hre_leagues_enabled=no
			hre_religion_locked=no
			hre_religion_treaty=no
		}
		major=Yes
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=6
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_HRE_Minors.3.OPT1
			add_reform_desire=0.05
			random_elector={
				limit={
					religion=protestant
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_HRE_Minors.6
				}
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_HRE_Minors.3.OPT2
			add_reform_desire=0.03
			1761={
				add_reform_center=protestant
			}
		}

			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}

FEE_Hungary_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Hungary_Events.1
		title=FEE_Hungary_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Hungary_Events.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=HAB
			is_year=1466
			exists=BOH
			BOH={
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				has_ruler_modifier=fee_boh_infertility
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
			modifier={
				factor=2
				is_at_war=yes
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.50
				is_at_war=no
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.25
				NOT={
					OR={
						BOH={
							truce_with=HUN
						}
						HUN={
							truce_with=BOH
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={
						any_neighbor_province={
							owner={
								tag=BOH
							}
						}
					}
					add_devastation=15
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Hungary_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
				modifier={
					factor=0
					NOT={
						is_at_war=yes
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_stability=-1
			every_owned_province={
				limit={
					any_neighbor_province={
						owner={
							tag=BOH
						}
					}
				}
				add_base_tax=-1
				add_base_production=-1
				add_base_manpower=-1
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Hungary_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
				modifier={
					factor=0
					is_at_war=yes
				}
			}
	
			custom_tooltip=fee_hun_austria_demands_reparations_tt
			tooltip={
				HAB={
					add_casus_belli={
						target=BOH
						type=cb_border_war
						months=12
					}
				}
			}
			BOH={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Hungary_Events.2
					days=30
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip=fee_hun_austria_calls_for_aid_tt
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Hungary_Events.2

				}

					}
				}
			}

		id=FEE_Hungary_Events.19

					}

			}

						}

					}
					set_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_silesia
				}
				if={
					limit={
						MVA={
							is_subject_of=HUN
							liberty_desire=50
						}
					}
					tooltip={
						inherit=MVA
					}
					set_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_moravia
				}
				if={
					limit={
						SOR={
							is_subject_of=HUN
							liberty_desire=50
						}
					}
					tooltip={
						inherit=SOR
					}
					set_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_lusatia
				}
				if={
					limit={
						has_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_silesia

				}
				if={
					limit={
						has_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_moravia
					}
					inherit=MVA
				}
				if={
					limit={
						has_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_lusatia
					}
					inherit=SOR
				}
				silesia_area={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					add_core=BOH
					cede_province=BOH
				}
				lusatia_area={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					add_core=BOH
					cede_province=BOH
				}
				moravia_area={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
					}
					add_core=BOH
					cede_province=BOH
				}

				clr_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_moravia
				clr_country_flag=fee_hun_integrate_lusatia
			}
		}

			name=FEE_Hungary_Events.19.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
	
			add_stability=-3
			HUN={
				if={

						}

							}
						}
					}

						}
					}

							spawn_rebels={
								type=nationalist_rebels
								size=3
							}
						}
					}
				}

		}

FEE_Irish_Events={
	
	
	country_event={

		title=FEE_Irish_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Irish_Events.1.D

		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			primary_culture=irish
			capital_scope={
				OR={
					area=munster_area
					area=connacht_area
					area=leinster_area
					area=ulster_area
				}
			}
			OR={
				owns=4377 #Ormond
				owns=4120 #Kildare
				owns=4118 #Desmond
				owns=4121 #Ulster
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=ENG
				}
				ENG={
					has_disaster=war_of_the_roses
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
		}

				factor=33
			}

			set_country_flag=irish_supporter_yorkists_flag
		}

				factor=33

			add_treasury=-20
	
			set_country_flag=irish_rejected_yorkists_flag

						value=20
					}

			name=FEE_Irish_Events.4.OPT1

				name=irish_dutch_military_aid
				duration=9125
			}
			add_mil_power=-200
			random_country={
				limit={
					capital_scope={
						region=low_countries_region
					}
					NOT={
						any_country={
							capital_scope={
								region=low_countries_region
							}
							army_size=PREV
							total_development=PREV
						}
					}
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=irish_dutch_support
				}
				reverse_add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=irish_dutch_support
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Irish_Events.4.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
			}
	
			add_manpower=-10
			add_mil_power=-100

				name=irish_spanish_ties
				duration=9125
			}

				limit={
					capital_scope={
						region=iberia_region
					}
					NOT={
						any_country={
							capital_scope={
								region=iberia_region
							}
							army_size=PREV
						}
					}
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=irish_iberian_support
				}
				reverse_add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=irish_iberian_support
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Irish_Events.4.OPT3
			trigger={
				is_at_war=no
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				any_country={
					capital_scope={
						region=france_region
					}
					is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				}
			}
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
			}
	
			add_treasury=200
			add_country_modifier={
				name=irish_french_overlordship
				duration=9125
			}
			random_country={
				limit={
					capital_scope={
						region=france_region
					}
					is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
					NOT={
						any_country={
							capital_scope={
								region=france_region
							}
							army_size=PREV
						}
					}
				}
				create_march=ROOT
			}
			munster_area={
				limit={
					country_or_non_sovereign_subject_holds=ROOT
				}
				add_core=ROOT
			}
			connacht_area={
				limit={
					country_or_non_sovereign_subject_holds=ROOT
				}
				add_core=ROOT
			}
			leinster_area={
				limit={
					country_or_non_sovereign_subject_holds=ROOT
				}
				add_core=ROOT
			}
			ulster_area={
				limit={
					country_or_non_sovereign_subject_holds=ROOT
				}
				add_core=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Irish_Events.4.OPT4
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=15}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=irish_fierce_independence
				duration=9125
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Italian_Wars_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.100
		title=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.100.T
		desc=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.100.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1494
			NOT={is_year=1498}
			tag=FRA
			valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes
			exists=FRA
			exists=NAP
			NAP={valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes}
			NOT={war_with=NAP}
			NOT={truce_with=NAP}
			NOT={alliance_with=NAP}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=3
		}
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			any_owned_province={
				OR={

				NOT={controlled_by=owner}

							offensive_war_with=NAP

			}
		}

			has_country_flag=fee_first_italian_war_flag
