	country_event={
		id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.400
		title=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.400.T
		desc=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.400.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1521
			NOT={is_year=1526}
			if={
				limit={
					hre_size=1
				}
				tag=emperor
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					exists=HAB
				}
				tag=HAB
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					tag=SPA
				}
				low_countries_region={
					owned_by=ROOT
				}
				iberia_region={
					owned_by=ROOT
				}
				italy_region={
					owned_by=ROOT
				}
			}
			is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
			exists=FRA
			FRA={
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				NOT={war_with=ROOT}
				NOT={truce_with=ROOT}
				NOT={alliance_with=ROOT}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=3
		}
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			any_owned_province={
				OR={
					region=italy_region
					region=france_region
					region=iberia_region
					is_part_of_hre=yes
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.400.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=75
				modifier={
					factor=1.33
					ai=yes
				}
				modifier={
					factor=100
					OR={
						is_rival=FRA
						is_enemy=FRA
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=0
					alliance_with=FRA
				}
			}
	
			declare_war_with_cb={
				who=FRA
				casus_belli=cb_humiliate
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					exists=NAV
					NAV={is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes}
				}
				NAV={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.401
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=VEN
					VEN={is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes}
				}
				VEN={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.401
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={tag=SPA}
					exists=SPA
					SPA={is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes}
				}
				SPA={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.401
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={tag=HAB}
					exists=HAB
					HAB={is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes}
				}
				HAB={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.401
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=ENG
					ENG={is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes}
				}
				ENG={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.401
					}
				}

			if={

					exists=MAN

						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.401

				factor=25

					factor=50
					NOT={stability=1}

					exists=BRG
					BRG={is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes}
				}
				BRG={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.701
					}
				}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					exists=KLE
					KLE={is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes}
				}
				KLE={
					country_event={
						id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.701
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.700.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
				modifier={
					factor=50
					NOT={stability=1}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=50
					NOT={manpower_percentage=0.50}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=50
					NOT={war_exhaustion=3}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=100
					any_country={
						owns=102
						army_size=ROOT
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=100
					102={
						owner={
							alliance_with=ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_prestige=-15
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-25 republican_tradition=-13}

	}

					}

					}

			}

		id=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.800
		title=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.800.T
		desc=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.800.D

				is_emperor=yes
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes

				NOT={truce_with=ROOT}
				NOT={alliance_with=ROOT}
			}
		}

			months=3
		}

				OR={
					region=italy_region

			name=FEE_Italian_Wars_Events.800.OPT1

				factor=75

					factor=1.33
					ai=yes

						is_enemy=SPA
						is_rival=SPA
					}

FEE_Italy_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Italy_Events.1

		desc=FEE_Italy_Events.1.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1500
			capital_scope={
				region=italy_region
			}
			culture_group=latin
			had_recent_war=10
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_italy_wars_flag}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=2
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_italy_wars_flag
			}
		}

			name=FEE_Italy_Events.1.OPT1

FEE_Jangladesh_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Jangladesh_Events.1
		title=FEE_Jangladesh_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Jangladesh_Events.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=JAN
			capital=512
			is_year=1470
			NOT={is_year=1490}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Jangladesh_Events.1.OPT1 #Splendid.
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			512={
				change_province_name="Bikaner"
				rename_capital="Bikaner"
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							OR={
								has_building=fort_15th
								has_building=fort_16th
								has_building=fort_17th
								has_building=fort_18th
							}
						}
					}
					add_building_construction={
						building=fort_15th
						speed=0.75
						cost=0
					}
				}
				else={
					add_base_manpower=3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Jewish_Events_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Jewish_Events.1000

		desc=FEE_Jewish_Events.1000.D

		trigger={
			OR={
				culture_group=latin
				capital_scope={
					region=italy_region
				}
				italy_region={
					owned_by=ROOT
					OR={
						has_province_modifier=italian_jew_allowed_stay
						has_province_modifier=italian_jew_allowed_stay_2
					}
				}
			}
			OR={
				NOT={has_country_flag=fee_jews_medic}
				had_country_flag={
					flag=fee_jews_medic
					days=5475
				}
			}
			NOT={has_ruler_modifier=fee_jews_medic_modifier}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_jews_medic
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=5
			modifier={
				factor=1.25
				religious_ideas=3
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Jewish_Events.1000.OPT1
	
			add_ruler_modifier={
				name=fee_jews_medic_modifier
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}

FEE_Jews_Italy_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.1
		title=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.1.D

		trigger={
			NOT={is_year=1470}
			OR={
				western_sicily_area={
					owned_by=ROOT
				}
				sicily_area={
					owned_by=ROOT
				}
			}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_jew_initial_event}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_jew_initial_event
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
		}

			custom_tooltip=FEE_JEW_START_OPPOSE_TT
			add_mil_power=25
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.2
		title=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.2.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1470
			NOT={is_year=1492}
			owns=124
			has_country_flag=fee_jew_initial_event
		}
	
		goto=124
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_treasury=25
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=25}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_mana_scaled_on_monarch_skill_fee=yes
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=25}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.3
		title=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.3.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			NOT={is_year=1470}
			has_country_flag=fee_jew_initial_event
			OR={
				western_sicily_area={
					owned_by=ROOT
					NOT={has_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_event}
				}
				sicily_area={
					owned_by=ROOT
					NOT={province_id=126}
					NOT={has_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_event}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=2
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						OR={
							area=western_sicily_area
							area=sicily_area
						}
						NOT={province_id=126}
						NOT={has_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_event}
					}
					save_event_target_as=event_target_fee_jews_italy_giudecca
					set_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_event
				}
			}
		}
	
		goto=event_target_fee_jews_italy_giudecca
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
				modifier={
					factor=2
					culture_group=iberian
				}
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=3}
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=10}
			add_mil_power=10
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.3.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=3 republican_tradition=3}
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={remove=10}
			event_target_event_target_fee_jews_italy_giudecca={
				if={
					limit={
						owner={ADM=4}
					}
					add_base_tax=1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						owner={DIP=4}
					}
					add_base_production=1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						owner={MIL=4}
					}
					add_base_manpower=1
				}

					set_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_approved
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.4
		title=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.4.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			NOT={is_year=1470}
			OR={
				western_sicily_area={
					owned_by=ROOT
					NOT={has_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_jews_of_root}
					had_province_flag={
						flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_approved
						days=1825
					}
				}
				sicily_area={
					owned_by=ROOT
					NOT={has_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_jews_of_root}
					had_province_flag={
						flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_approved
						days=1825
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						OR={
							area=sicily_area
							area=western_sicily_area
						}
						NOT={has_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_jews_of_root}
						had_province_flag={
							flag=fee_jew_sicily_giudecca_approved
							days=1825
						}
					}
					set_province_flag=fee_jew_sicily_jews_of_root
					save_event_target_as=event_target_fee_jews_italy
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=5
		}
	
		goto=event_target_fee_jews_italy
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Jews_Italy_Events.4.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
				modifier={
					factor=2
					culture_group=iberian
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip=REJECT_JEWS_TT

					size=1
				}
			}
		}

		id=FEE_Korea_Events.4
		title=FEE_Korea_Events.4.T

					flag=fee_kor_office_censor_timer
					days=3650
				}
			}
		}

			months=800

				factor=0.6
				NOT={
					stability=0
				}
			}

				factor=1.2
				advisor=statesman

				factor=1.2

			}
		}

		option={
			name=FEE_Korea_Events.4.OPT1

		}

			add_stability=-1
		}
	}

FEE_Low_Countries={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.1
		title=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.1.D
		picture=DEBATE_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			tag=BUR
			HOL={is_subject_of=ROOT}
			FLA={is_subject_of=ROOT}
			BRB={is_subject_of=ROOT}
			is_year=1450
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=60
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_lw_estates_general
				duration=18250
			}
			HOL={add_liberty_desire=-15}
			FLA={add_liberty_desire=-15}
			BRB={add_liberty_desire=-15}
			every_core_province={
				limit={
					OR={
						culture=flemish
						culture=dutch
						culture=wallonian
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_rights_privileges
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			if={
				limit={
					calc_true_if={
						amount=3
						all_subject_country={
							OR={
								AND={
									is_expanded_mod_active={mod=subjects}
									OR={
										is_subject_of_type=brother_kingdom
										is_subject_of_type=integrated_personal_union
									}
								}
								is_subject_of_type=personal_union
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_asserted_control_3
					duration=18250
				}
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					calc_true_if={
						amount=2
						all_subject_country={
							OR={
								AND={
									is_expanded_mod_active={mod=subjects}
									OR={
										is_subject_of_type=brother_kingdom
										is_subject_of_type=integrated_personal_union
									}
								}
								is_subject_of_type=personal_union
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_asserted_control_2
					duration=18250
				}
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					calc_true_if={
						amount=1
						all_subject_country={
							OR={
								AND={
									is_expanded_mod_active={mod=subjects}
									OR={
										is_subject_of_type=brother_kingdom
										is_subject_of_type=integrated_personal_union
									}
								}
								is_subject_of_type=personal_union
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_asserted_control_1
					duration=18250
				}
			}
			else={
				add_country_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_asserted_control_0
					duration=18250
				}
			}
			HOL={add_liberty_desire=15}
			FLA={add_liberty_desire=15}
			BRB={add_liberty_desire=15}
			every_core_province={
				limit={
					OR={
						culture=flemish
						culture=dutch
						culture=wallonian
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_rights_suppressed
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.2
		title=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.2.D
		picture=MERCHANTS_TALKING_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			tag=HOL
			owns=97
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
			}
	
			97={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_grain_import_center
					duration=-1
				}
			}
			1926={
				add_trade_modifier={
					who=ROOT
					duration=-1
					power=10
					key=fee_lw_baltic_trade_influence
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.3
		title=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.3.D
		picture=ANGRY_MOB_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			OR={
				NOT={tag=FRI}
				NOT={tag=EFR}
			}
			owns=100
			owns=4382
			owns=1931
			is_year=1500
			NOT={is_year=1530}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			random_owned_province={
				limit={culture=frisian}
				spawn_rebels={
					size=3
					type=leadered_peasant_rebels
					leader="Pier Gerlofs Donia"
				}
			}
			every_owned_province={
				limit={culture=frisian}
				add_local_autonomy=25
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.3.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
			trigger={
				NOT={exists=FRI}
			}
	
			100={
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={is_core=FRI}
					}
					add_core=FRI
				}
			}
			4382={
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={is_core=FRI}
					}
					add_core=FRI
				}
			}
			1931={
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={is_core=FRI}
					}
					add_core=FRI
				}
			}
			release=FRI
			create_march=FRI
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.4
		title=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.4.D
		picture=CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture

			OR={
				tag=SPA

			}

			1744={
				owner={
					war_with=ROOT
				}
			}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_lw_sacked_antwerp_flag}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						is_bankrupt=no
					}
					random_list={
						25={
							country_event={id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.5}
							set_country_flag=fee_lw_sacked_antwerp_flag
						}
						75={add_prestige=-5}
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						is_bankrupt=yes
					}
					country_event={id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.5}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.4.OPT1
	
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.5
		title=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.5.T

		picture=CITY_eventPicture

		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.5.OPT1

			add_army_professionalism=-0.025
			add_prestige=-20

				name=fee_lw_spanish_fury
				duration=14600
			}
			1744={
				owner={
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_lw_sacked_antwerp
					}
					country_event={id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.6}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.5.OPT2
	
			add_years_of_income=0.1
			add_army_professionalism=0.05
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			add_mil_power=-35
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_lw_discipline_restored
				duration=14600
			}
			1744={
				owner={
					add_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						modifier=fee_lw_sacked_antwerp_punished_mutineers
					}
					country_event={id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.6}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.6
		title=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.6.T
		desc=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.6.D
		picture=CITY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Low_Countries_Events.6.OPT1

				name=fee_lw_black_legend
				duration=-1
			}
			1744={
				add_base_tax=-2
				add_base_production=-2
				add_base_manpower=-2
				add_devastation=95
				if={
					limit={
						has_trade_building_trigger=yes
					}
					remove_building=marketplace
					remove_building=trade_depot
					remove_building=stock_exchange
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_destroyed_infrastructure
					duration=7300
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_decline_antwerp_cloth_market
					duration=-1
				}
			}
	
			97={
				add_base_tax=1
				add_base_production=2
				add_base_manpower=1

					name=fee_lw_refugees_antwerp
					duration=7300
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_lw_legacy_antwerp
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	}

			months=72

	country_event={

FEE_Marathas_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Marathas_Events.1
		title=FEE_Marathas_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Marathas_Events.1.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		major=yes
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1620
			NOT={is_year=1690}
			NOT={
				exists=MAR
			}
			any_owned_province={
				culture=marathi
				religion=hinduism
			}
			if={
				limit={
					ai=yes
				}
				num_of_cities=6
			}
			else={
				num_of_cities=10
			}
			NOT={
				any_country={has_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy}
			}
			NOT={primary_culture=marathi}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=360
			modifier={
				factor=5
				religion=hinduism
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.5
				accepted_culture=marathi
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				religion=sunni
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.5
				ai=no
				is_at_war=yes
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				NOT={
					num_of_cities=11
				}
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						culture=marathi
						religion=hinduism
					}
					add_core=MAR
				}
				release=MAR
				MAR={
					define_ruler={
						name="Shivaji"
						dynasty="Bhonsle"
						ADM=4
						DIP=4
						MIL=5
					}
				}
				every_province={
					limit={
						culture=marathi
					}
					add_claim=MAR
					add_core=MAR
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.1.OPT1
	
			hidden_effect={
				MAR={
					add_manpower=20
					add_treasury=100
					add_adm_power=100
					add_dip_power=100
					add_mil_power=100
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.7
							cavalry=0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
			MAR={
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=ROOT
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	province_event={
		id=FEE_Marathas_Events.2
		title=FEE_Marathas_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Marathas_Events.2.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			owner={
				OR={
					AND={
						has_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy
						num_of_cities=5
						war_with=MAR
					}
					AND={
						any_subject_country={
							has_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy
						}
						num_of_cities=6
						war_with=MAR
					}
				}
			}
			culture=marathi
			any_neighbor_province={
				owned_by=MAR
			}
			is_capital=no
			NOT={
				owner={
					has_country_flag=fee_marathas_no_more_defections
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=18
			modifier={
				factor=0.7
				religion=hinduism
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				if={
					limit={
						owner={
							has_country_flag=fee_defected_once
						}
					}
					owner={
						set_country_flag=fee_marathas_no_more_defections
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.2.OPT1
	
			add_core=MAR
			cede_province=MAR
			hidden_effect={
				MAR={
					country_event={id=FEE_Marathas_Events.3}
				}
			}
			infantry=ROOT
			infantry=ROOT
			cavalry=ROOT
			hidden_effect={
				owner={
					set_country_flag=fee_defected_once
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Marathas_Events.3
		title=FEE_Marathas_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Marathas_Events.3.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.3.OPT1
	
			add_mil_power=50
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Marathas_Events.4
		title=FEE_Marathas_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Marathas_Events.4.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=MAR
			any_country={
				has_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy
				war_with=MAR
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=18
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.4.OPT1
	
			add_mil_power=50
			add_manpower=2
			add_treasury=25
			random_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy
				}
				country_event={id=FEE_Marathas_Events.5}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Marathas_Events.5
		title=FEE_Marathas_Events.5.T
		desc=FEE_Marathas_Events.5.D
		picture=ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.5.OPT1
	
			add_mil_power=-25
			add_manpower=-3
			if={
				limit={
					num_of_generals=1
				}
				kill_leader={type=general}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Marathas_Events.6
		title=FEE_Marathas_Events.6.T
		desc=FEE_Marathas_Events.6.D
		picture=LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy
			war_with=MAR
			OR={
				deccan_region={
					owner={
						technology_group=western
						NOT={
							war_with=ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				west_india_region={
					owner={
						technology_group=western
						NOT={
							war_with=ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=30
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.6.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
			}
	
			add_treasury=-25
			add_mil_power=25
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_mar_western_aid_marathan_enemy
				duration=365
			}
			MAR={
				country_event={id=FEE_Marathas_Events.7 days=30 random=10}
			}
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					region=deccan_region
				}
				leather_cannon=THIS
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.6.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			add_adm_power=10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Marathas_Events.7
		title=FEE_Marathas_Events.7.T
		desc=FEE_Marathas_Events.7.D
		picture=SIEGE_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			any_country={
				has_country_flag=fee_marathas_marathi_enemy
				war_with=MAR
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.7.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
			}
	
			add_mil_power=100
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_mar_seized_western_arms
				duration=720
			}
			random_country={
				limit={
					technology_group=western
					any_owned_province={
						OR={
							region=deccan_region
							region=west_india_region
						}
					}
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=MAR
					modifier=fee_mar_maratha_raided_stores
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Marathas_Events.7.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
			}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Meme_Events={
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Meme_Events.1
		title=FEE_Meme_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Meme_Events.1.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			ai=no
			NOT={
				has_global_flag=FEE_Meme_Happened
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=1
		}
	
		immediate={
			set_global_flag=FEE_Meme_Happened
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Meme_Events.1.OPT1
			set_global_flag=FEE_Meme_Active
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Meme_Events.1.OPT2
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Meme_Events.2
		title=FEE_Meme_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Meme_Events.2.D
		picture=MILITARY_CAMP_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_global_flag=FEE_Meme_Active
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_meme_hero_fired}
			NOT={total_development=100}
			OR={
				war_exhaustion=5
				NOT={war_score=-25}
			}
			any_country={
				total_development=100
				war_with=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=3
		}
	
		immediate={
			set_country_flag=fee_meme_hero_fired
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Meme_Events.2.OPT1
	
			create_general={
				tradition=75
			}
			add_war_exhaustion=-5
			add_stability=1
			add_mil_power=50
		}
	}
}

FEE_Mughals_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Mughals_Events.1
		title=FEE_Mughals_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Mughals_Events.1.D
		picture=FORT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=MUG
			owns=522
			is_year=1630
			NOT={is_year=1670}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=240
			modifier={
				factor=2
				is_at_war=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Mughals_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
				modifier={
					num_of_loans=25
					factor=0
				}
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.2
			add_dip_power=20
			add_mil_power=30
			522={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_mug_red_fort
					duration=-1
				}
			}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Mughals_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
			}
	
			add_adm_power=10
			add_prestige=-1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Mughals_Events.2
		title=FEE_Mughals_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Mughals_Events.2.D
		picture=FORT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=MUG
			num_of_owned_provinces_with={
				value=4
				religion=hinduism
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=240
			modifier={
				factor=0.7
				has_idea_group=humanist_ideas
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Mughals_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=80
			}
	
			add_dip_power=50
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_mug_integration_hindu_culture
				duration=36500
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Mughals_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
			}
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_mug_hindu_conversion_policy
				duration=730
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Mughals_Events.2.OPT3
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Mughals_Events.3
		title=FEE_Mughals_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Mughals_Events.3.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			tag=MUG
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_mug_received_tribute}
			any_subject_country={
				OR={
					NOT={has_country_flag=fee_mug_paid_tribute}
					had_country_flag={
						flag=fee_mug_paid_tribute
						days=3650
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_mug_received_tribute
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Mughals_Events.3.OPT1
	
			add_years_of_income=0.2
			random_subject_country={
				reverse_add_opinion={
					who=MUG
					modifier=fee_mug_paid_tribute
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=MUG
					modifier=fee_mug_paid_tribute
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

FEE_Naples_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Naples_Events.1
		title=FEE_Naples_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Naples_Events.1.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=NAP
				tag=TTS
				was_tag=NAP
			}
			has_ruler="Alfons V"
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=24
		}
	
		immediate={
			add_ruler_modifier={
				name=fee_nap_magnanimo
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Naples_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
	
			define_advisor={
				type=philosopher
				name="Lorenzo Valla"
				skill=2
				culture=umbrian
				religion=catholic
				cost_multiplier=0.33
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Naples_Events.1.OPT2

					name=fee_nap_transumanza
					duration=-1
				}
			}

				add_base_production=1

					name=fee_nap_transumanza

				}

				}
			}

				add_base_production=1

				}

				}
			}

						}
					}
					else={
						spawn_rebels={
							size=3
							type=noble_rebels
						}
						owner={
							random_owned_province={
								limit={
									OR={
										area=calabria_area
										area=naples_area
										area=apulia_area
									}
								}
								spawn_rebels={
									size=3
									type=noble_rebels
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							estate_influence={
								estate=estate_nobles
								influence=65
							}
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								area=calabria_area
								area=naples_area
								area=apulia_area
							}
						}
						spawn_rebels={
							size=1
							type=noble_rebels
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								area=calabria_area
								area=naples_area
								area=apulia_area
							}
						}
						spawn_rebels={
							size=1
							type=noble_rebels
						}
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							estate_influence={
								estate=estate_nobles
								influence=75
							}
						}
						estate_influence={
							estate=estate_nobles
							influence=65
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								area=calabria_area
								area=naples_area
								area=apulia_area
							}
						}
						spawn_rebels={
							size=2
							type=noble_rebels
						}
					}
					random_owned_province={
						limit={
							OR={
								area=calabria_area

							}

FEE_Navarra_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Navarra_Events.1
		title=FEE_Navarra_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Navarra_Events.1.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=NAV
			is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
			ARA={
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
			}
			has_opinion={
				who=ARA
				value=-10
			}
			OR={
				AND={
					is_female=yes
					ARA={
						is_female=no
					}
				}
				AND={
					OR={
						has_female_heir=yes
						has_heir=no
					}
					ARA={
						has_heir=yes
						has_female_heir=no
					}
				}
				AND={
					is_female=yes
					ARA={
						has_female_heir=no
						heir_age=15
					}
				}
			}
			NOT={is_year=1510}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=90
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Navarra_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
			}
	
			ARA={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Navarra_Events.2
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Navarra_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
			}
	
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-5 republican_tradition=-3}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Navarra_Events.2
		title=FEE_Navarra_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Navarra_Events.2.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Navarra_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
				modifier={
					factor=0
					is_subject=yes
				}
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes
					NAV={valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes}
				}
				create_union=NAV
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Navarra_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
				modifier={
					factor=100
					is_subject=yes
				}
			}
	
			add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-5 republican_tradition=-3}
			FROM={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Navarra_Events.3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Navarra_Events.3

						}
						NOT={
							prestige=1
						}
					}
					valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes
					NAV={valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes}
				}
				create_union=NAV
			}
			NAV={
				country_event={id=FEE_Navarra_Events.8 days=3}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Navarra_Events.7.OPT3
	
			break_union=NAV
			NAV={
				define_ruler={
					name="Carlos"
					dynasty="de Trastamara"
					ADM=3
					DIP=4
					MIL=5
					age=16
				}
				country_event={id=FEE_Navarra_Events.9}
			}
		}
	}

						is_capital=no

							region=japan_region
							region=indonesia_region
							region=deccan_region
						}
					}

			tag=NED

					culture=dutch
					culture=wallonian
					culture=flemish
				}
				is_capital=no
				NOT={has_province_modifier=fee_ned_generality_lands}
			}
		}

			months=60
		}

					has_owner_religion=no

						culture=dutch

					NOT={has_province_modifier=fee_ned_generality_lands}
				}

					name=fee_ned_generality_lands
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}

		title=FEE_Netherlands_Events.15.T
		desc=FEE_Netherlands_Events.15.D

		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Netherlands_Events.15.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_war_exhaustion=-2
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
			if={
				limit={
					capital_scope={has_port=yes}
				}
				capital_scope={
					heavy_ship=ROOT
					heavy_ship=ROOT
				}
			}
			else={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={has_port=yes}
					heavy_ship=ROOT
					heavy_ship=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Netherlands_Events.16
		title=FEE_Netherlands_Events.16.T
		desc=FEE_Netherlands_Events.16.D
		picture=EXPLORERS_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
		trigger={
			tag=NED
			owns=1177
			has_idea=quest_for_the_new_world
			has_idea=colonial_ventures
			has_idea=overseas_exploration
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=200
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Netherlands_Events.16.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
			1177={
				add_base_production=3
				add_base_manpower=4
				if={
					limit={
						owner={
							NOT={mil_tech=14}
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={has_building=fort_18th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_17th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_16th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_15th}
						}
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_15th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						owner={
							mil_tech=14
							NOT={mil_tech=19}
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={has_building=fort_15th}
						remove_building=fort_15th
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_16th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							NOT={has_building=fort_18th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_17th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_16th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_15th}
						}
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_16th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						owner={
							mil_tech=19
							NOT={mil_tech=24}
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={has_building=fort_15th}
						remove_building=fort_15th
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_17th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={has_building=fort_16th}
						remove_building=fort_16th
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_17th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							NOT={has_building=fort_18th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_17th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_16th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_15th}
						}
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_17th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						owner={
							mil_tech=24
						}
					}
					if={
						limit={has_building=fort_15th}
						remove_building=fort_15th
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_18th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={has_building=fort_16th}
						remove_building=fort_16th
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_18th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={has_building=fort_17th}
						remove_building=fort_17th
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_18th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
					else_if={
						limit={
							NOT={has_building=fort_18th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_17th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_16th}
							NOT={has_building=fort_15th}
						}
						add_building_construction={
							building=fort_17th
							speed=0.25
							cost=0
						}
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_building=workshop}
					}
					add_building=workshop
				}
				change_culture=ROOT
				change_religion=ROOT
			}
		}

			name=FEE_Netherlands_Events.16.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
			trade_company_south_africa={

					name=fee_ned_boer_migration
					duration=10950
				}
				change_culture=ROOT
				change_religion=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Netherlands_Events.16.OPT3
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
	
			if={
				limit={
					has_estate=estate_burghers
				}
				add_estate_burghers_loyalty_effect=yes
			}
			else={add_mercantilism=2}
		}
	}

					}
				}
			}

				name=fee_ned_stand_against_france
				duration=-1
			}

				type=cb_liberation
				target=FRA
			}

FEE_Norway_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Norway_Events.1
		title=FEE_Norway_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Norway_Events.1.D
		picture=TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=NOR
			owns=20
			is_year=1640
			NOT={is_year=1750}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=360
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Norway_Events.1.OPT1
			20={
				change_trade_goods=copper
				add_base_production=1
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Norway_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_treasury=50
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Norway_Events.2
		title=FEE_Norway_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Norway_Events.2.D
		picture=IMPORTANT_STATUE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			overlord_of=NOR
			OR={
				religion=protestant
				religion=reformed
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
			modifier={
				factor=0.5
				OR={
					NOR={
						religion=protestant
					}
					NOR={
						religion=reformed
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Norway_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
			}
	
			NOR={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Norway_Events.3 days=10 random=5
				}
				add_treasury=25
				random_owned_province={
					limit={
						NOT={has_owner_religion=yes}
					}
					change_religion=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Norway_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
			}
	
			add_prestige=-5
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Norway_Events.3
		title=FEE_Norway_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Norway_Events.3.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Norway_Events.3.OPT1
	
			add_liberty_desire=5
			add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_nor_destroyed_saint_olav_shrine
			}
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_nor_destroyed_saint_olav_shrine
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Novgorod_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Novgorod_Events.1
		title=FEE_Novgorod_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Novgorod_Events.1.D
		picture=FAMINE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=NOV
			had_recent_war=5
			is_year=1445
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=24
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
				modifier={
					factor=60
					NOT={
						num_of_loans=5
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-1.5
			add_dip_power=-15
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_manpower=-6
			set_country_flag=fee_nov_novgorodian_famine
			custom_tooltip=fee_nov_famine_tt
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Novgorod_Events.2
		title=FEE_Novgorod_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Novgorod_Events.2.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=NOV
			is_year=1450
			has_country_flag=fee_nov_novgorodian_famine
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=48
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.2.OPT1
	
			set_country_flag=fee_nov_novgorodian_latinism
			clr_country_flag=fee_nov_novgorodian_famine
			custom_tooltip=fee_nov_latinisation_novgorod
		}

			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.2.OPT2
			trigger={
				LIT={
					is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				}
			}
	
			add_years_of_income=-2
			LIT={
				country_event={id=FEE_Novgorod_Events.5 days=10}
			}
			clr_country_flag=fee_nov_novgorodian_famine
			custom_tooltip=fee_nov_vassalization_tt
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.2.OPT3
			trigger={
				MOS={
					is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				}
			}
	
			MOS={
				country_event={id=FEE_Novgorod_Events.6 days=10}
			}
			clr_country_flag=fee_nov_novgorodian_famine
			custom_tooltip=fee_nov_vassalization_tt
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.2.OPT4
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_nov_great_famine
				duration=1825
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Novgorod_Events.3
		title=FEE_Novgorod_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Novgorod_Events.3.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_CONVERSION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=NOV
		}

			months=48
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
			}
	
			change_religion=catholic
			capital_scope={
				change_religion=catholic
			}

				limit={
					exists=MOS
				}

						id=FEE_Novgorod_Events.7
					}
				}

				limit={

				}

					type=orthodox_rebels
					size=2
				}

			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					is_capital=no
				}
				spawn_rebels={
					type=orthodox_rebels
					size=1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Novgorod_Events.3.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0

					factor=25
					treasury=200
				}

			}
			if={

					add_treasury=200
				}
			}

				}

				}
			}
			random_owned_province={

					size=2
				}
			}
			random_owned_province={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=orthodox_rebels
					size=1
				}
			}

				spawn_rebels={
					type=orthodox_rebels
					size=1
				}
			}
		}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Novgorod_Events.4
		title=FEE_Novgorod_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Novgorod_Events.4.D
		picture=REFORM_eventPicture

		desc=FEE_Nuremberg_Events.1.D

			tag=NUM
			hre_size=1
			owns_core_province=67

			is_at_war=no
			emperor={
				is_at_war=no
				NOT={has_country_flag=fee_emperor_first_diet}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				emperor={
					set_country_flag=fee_emperor_first_diet
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Nuremberg_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			add_treasury=10
		}
	}
}
FEE_Ottoman_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ottoman_Events.1

			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ottoman_Events.2
		title=FEE_Ottoman_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Ottoman_Events.2.D
		picture=COUNTRY_COLLAPSE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=TUR
			owns_or_non_sovereign_subject_of=134
		}

			months=12
		}
	
		option={	#Let us reinforce our European gains.
			name=FEE_Ottoman_Events.2.OPT1
	
			134={
				add_base_manpower=1
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_tur_european_stronghold
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={#Tis but another border province. Let them rebuild.
			name=FEE_Ottoman_Events.2.OPT2
	
			134={
				add_base_production=1
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ottoman_Events.3
		title=FEE_Ottoman_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Ottoman_Events.3.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=TUR
			has_ruler="Mehmet II Fatih"
			NOT={is_year=1450}
			NOT={stability=2}
			is_subject=no
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=24
		}

			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_tur_murad_reign
			}
		}

			name=FEE_Ottoman_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
			}
	
			define_ruler={
				name="Murad II"
				dynasty=Osmanoglu
				adm=4
				dip=3
				mil=4
				age=42
			}
			define_heir={
				name="Mehmet II Fatih"
				dynasty=Osmanoglu
				birth_date=1432.3.30
				adm=5
				dip=5
				mil=6
			}
			add_adm_power=50
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_tur_jannisariescalmed
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Ottoman_Events.3.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=0
			}
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_tur_jannisariesagainst_ruler
				duration=3650
			}
			capital_scope={
				noble_rebels=2
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Ottoman_Events.4
		title=FEE_Ottoman_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Ottoman_Events.4.D

				}

					limit={
						has_building=temple
					}

						building=cathedral
						speed=0
						cost=0
					}
				}
				else={
					add_building_construction={
						building=temple
						speed=0
						cost=0
					}
				}
			}

						is_capital=yes
					}
				}
				add_base_tax=1
			}
	
		}

				factor=33
			}

			tag=PAL
			BOH={
				is_in_war={
					attacker_leader=PAL
					casus_belli=cb_restore_personal_union
				}
				owns=267
			}
			267={
				OR={
					has_building=fort_15th
					has_building=fort_16th
					has_building=fort_17th
					has_building=fort_18th
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Palatinate_Events.8.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=100
			}
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=pal_winter_blitzkrieg
				duration=1825
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_dlc="Rights of Man"
				}
				add_ruler_personality=bold_fighter_personality
			}
			267={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=pal_palatine_collaboration
					duration=365
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Palatinate_Events.9
		title=FEE_Palatinate_Events.9.T
		desc=FEE_Palatinate_Events.9.D
		picture=HRE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
		}
	
		trigger={
			tag=PAL
			senior_union_with=BOH
			hre_leagues_enabled=yes
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Palatinate_Events.9.OPT1
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
			}
			BOH={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=pal_stay_united
				}
				add_liberty_desire=-50
			}
			emperor={
				add_casus_belli={
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
					target=BOH
				}
			}
			random_country={
				limit={
					in_league=protestant
					is_league_leader=yes
				}
				add_casus_belli={
					type=cb_liberation
					target=ROOT
				}
			}
			every_country={
				limit={
					is_part_of_hre=yes
					in_league=protestant
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=pal_union_crowns_opinion
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=pal_union_crowns
				duration=9125
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Palatinate_Events.9.OPT2
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
				modifier={
					factor=0
					was_player=no
				}
			}
	
			add_stability=-1
			break_union=BOH
			every_country={
				limit={
					is_part_of_hre=yes
					in_league=protestant
				}
				add_opinion={
					modifier=pal_appeased_league_opinion
					who=ROOT
				}
			}
			emperor={
				add_casus_belli={
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
					target=BOH
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=pal_appeased_league
				duration=9125
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Palatinate_Events.9.OPT3
	
			ai_chance={
				factor=33
				modifier={
					factor=0
					was_player=no
				}
			}
	
			add_stability=-1
			random_list={
				55={
					break_union=BOH
					if={
						limit={
							emperor={valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes}
							BOH={valid_for_personal_unions_trigger=yes}
						}
						emperor={create_union=BOH}
					}
				}
				45={add_legitimacy_equivalent={amount=-10 republican_tradition=-5}}
			}
			emperor={
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=pal_faitfhful
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=pal_faitfhful_imperial_laws
				duration=9125
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Palatinate_Events.10

FEE_Pangasinan_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1
		title=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1.D
		picture=BARBARY_PIRATES_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_dlc="Golden Century"
			owns_core_province=2698
			is_year=1560
			NOT={is_year=1580}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=90
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1.OPT1 #Sure why not.
			trigger={
				tag=PGS
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				NOT={has_reform=pirate_republic_reform}
			}
			ai_chance={factor=20}
	
			add_stability=-1
			if={
				limit={
					has_dlc="Dharma"
				}
				change_government=republic
				add_government_reform=pirate_republic_reform
			}
			else={
				set_legacy_government=pirate_republic
			}
			define_ruler={
				name="Lim"
				dynasty="Hong"
				culture=hakka
				religion=confucianism
				male=yes
				adm=2
				dip=5
				mil=3
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1.OPT2 #Crush him.
			trigger={
				OR={
					exists=PGS
					capital=2698
				}
			}
			ai_chance={factor=95}
	
			2698={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=2
					leader="Lim Hong"
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1.OPT3 #Refuse him the offer.
			trigger={
				NOT={exists=PGS}
				NOT={capital=2698}
			}
	
			ai_chance={factor=90}
	
			2698={
				cede_province=PGS
			}
			PGS={
				if={
					limit={
						has_dlc="Dharma"
						is_subject=no
					}
					change_government=republic
					add_government_reform=pirate_republic_reform
				}
				else={
					set_legacy_government=pirate_republic
				}
				define_ruler={
					name="Lim Hong"
					culture=hakka
					religion=confucianism
					male=yes
					adm=2
					dip=5
					mil=3
				}
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=ROOT
					casus_belli=cb_independence_war
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				2698={
					build_to_forcelimit={
						infantry=0.9
						cavalry=0.1
					}
					heavy_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					transport=PGS
					transport=PGS
					transport=PGS
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1.OPT4 #Give the land to him.
			trigger={
				NOT={exists=PGS}
				NOT={capital=2698}
			}
	
			ai_chance={factor=5}
			2698={
				cede_province=PGS
			}
			PGS={
				if={
					limit={
						has_dlc="Dharma"
						is_subject=no
					}
					change_government=republic
					add_government_reform=pirate_republic_reform
				}
				else={
					set_legacy_government=pirate_republic
				}
				define_ruler={
					name="Lim Hong"
					culture=hakka
					religion=confucianism
					male=yes
				}
			}
			southern_luzon_area={
				limit={
					NOT={is_core=PGS}
					NOT={is_claim=PGS}
				}
				add_claim=PGS
			}
			visayas_area={
				limit={
					NOT={is_core=PGS}
					NOT={is_claim=PGS}
				}
				add_claim=PGS
			}
			hidden_effect={
				2698={
					build_to_forcelimit={
						infantry=0.9
						cavalry=0.1
					}
					heavy_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					light_ship=PGS
					transport=PGS
					transport=PGS
					transport=PGS
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Pangasinan_Events.1.OPT5 #Offer him a position in our court.
			trigger={
				has_reform=pirate_republic_reform
			}
	
			define_advisor={
				type=spymaster
				name="Lim Hong"
				skill=1
				culture=hakka
				religion=confucianism
			}
		}
	}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Papal_State_Events.1

		desc=FEE_Papal_State_Events.1.D
		picture=CORRUPTION_eventPicture

			tag=PAP
			papacy_active=yes
			NOT={is_religion_enabled=protestant}
			OR={
				has_country_flag=fee_pap_indulgence_salesman_flag
				had_country_flag={
					flag=fee_pap_indulgence_salesman_flag
					days=3650
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=360
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				advisor=statesman
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				ADM=4
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				is_papal_controller=yes
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=fee_pap_indulgence_salesman_flag
				set_country_flag=fee_pap_indulgence_salesman_flag
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Papal_State_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_treasury=50
			add_reform_desire=0.01
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Papal_State_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_treasury=10
			add_reform_desire=-0.01
		}
	}
}

		}

			}

	}

			tag=PER

				had_country_flag={
					flag=fee_per_qizilbash_support

				}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.1
		title=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.1.D
		picture=BARBARY_PIRATES_eventPicture

			is_year=1580
			tag=TUR

			is_neighbor_of=PLC

				has_estate=estate_cossacks
				NOT={truce_with=TUR}
			}
			OR={
				is_rival=PLC
				is_enemy=PLC
			}

						days=30
						random=15
					}

			}

		desc=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.18.D
		picture=GENERALS_DISCUSSING_eventPicture
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.18.OPT1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.19
		title=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.19.T
		desc=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.19.D
		picture=GENERALS_DISCUSSING_eventPicture
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.19.OPT1
	
			hidden_effect={country_event={id=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.20}}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.19.OPT2
	
			hidden_effect={country_event={id=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.21}}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.20
		title=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.20.T
		desc=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.20.D
		picture=MILITARY_CAMP_eventPicture
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				if={
				limit={
					4542={has_province_flag=PLC_tabor_lubnie}
				}
				4542={
					remove_building=fort_15th
					clr_province_flag=PLC_tabor_lubnie
				}
			}
	
			4542={change_controller=ROOT}
	
			set_country_flag=PLC_dealt_with_nalyvaiko_uprising_peacefully_3
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.20.OPT1
	
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_nobles
				loyalty=-10
			}
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_cossacks
				loyalty=10
			}
			add_stability=-1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.21
		title=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.21.T
		desc=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.21.D

				}
				4542={
					remove_building=fort_15th
					clr_province_flag=PLC_tabor_lubnie
				}
			}
	
			4542={change_controller=ROOT}
	
			set_country_flag=PLC_dealt_with_nalyvaiko_uprising_bloody
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_PLC_Cossack_Revolts_Events.21.OPT1
	
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_nobles
				loyalty=10
			}
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_cossacks
				loyalty=-10
			}
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=nalyvaiko_cossack_lands_confiscated
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Poland_Events.1
		title=FEE_Poland_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Poland_Events.1.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_TURMOIL_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=POL
				tag=PLC
			}
			religion=catholic
			current_age=age_of_reformation
			NOT={is_defender_of_faith=yes}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=120
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				num_of_owned_provinces_with={
					value=5
					religion=orthodox
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.5
				num_of_owned_provinces_with={
					value=10
					religion=orthodox
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=2
				tag=POL
				exists=PLC
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				tag=PLC
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Poland_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_pol_uniate_church
				duration=-1
			}
			custom_tooltip=POLAND_RUTHENIA_TRUE_BELIEVERS_TT
			tooltip={
				random_owned_province={
					limit={culture=ruthenian}
					add_province_modifier={
						name=fee_pol_true_believers
						duration=-1
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect={
				every_owned_province={
					limit={culture=ruthenian}
					change_religion=orthodox
					add_province_modifier={
						name=fee_pol_true_believers
						duration=-1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Poland_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_stability=-1
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_pol_catholicism_entrenched
				duration=-1
			}
			random_owned_province={
				limit={culture=ruthenian}
				spawn_rebels={
					size=3
					religion=orthodox
					type=orthodox_rebels
				}
			}
			random_owned_province={
				limit={culture=ruthenian}
				spawn_rebels={
					size=3
					religion=orthodox
					type=orthodox_rebels
				}
			}
		}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Poland_Events.22
		title=FEE_Poland_Events.22.T
		desc=FEE_Poland_Events.22.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={	# Humble before Poland
			name=FEE_Poland_Events.22.OPT1
	
			change_tag=PRU
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=25}
			change_religion=protestant
			capital_scope={
				change_religion=protestant
			}
			restore_country_name_effect=yes
			swap_non_generic_missions=yes
			if={
				limit={
					is_revolutionary=no
					NOT={
						government=republic
					}
				}
				change_government_to_monarchy=yes
				add_government_reform=prussian_monarchy
			}
			else_if={
				limit={
					is_revolutionary=no
				}
				add_government_reform=prussian_republic_reform
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_reform=states_general_reform
				}
				remove_government_reform=states_general_reform
			}
			every_neighbor_country={
				limit={government=monarchy}
				add_opinion={who=ROOT modifier=secularized_monastic_order}
			}
			if={
				limit={
					has_custom_ideas=no
					NOT={has_idea_group=PRU_ideas}
				}
				country_event={id=ideagroups.1}#Swap Ideas
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name="centralization_modifier"
				duration=3650
			}
			east_prussia_area={
				limit={
					NOT={owned_by=ROOT}
				}
				add_permanent_claim=PRU
			}
			west_prussia_area={
				limit={
					NOT={owned_by=ROOT}
				}
				add_permanent_claim=PRU
			}
			set_country_flag=formed_prussia_flag
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Poland_Events.23
		title=FEE_Poland_Events.23.T
		desc=FEE_Poland_Events.23.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={	# Humble before Poland
			name=FEE_Poland_Events.23.OPT1
	
			FROM={inherit=LIV}
		}
	
		option={	# We are too strong
			name=FEE_Poland_Events.23.OPT2
	
			FROM={
				declare_war_with_cb={
					who=LIV
					casus_belli=cb_annex
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}

			months=120
		}

			name=FEE_Portugal_Events.14.OPT1

				1466={
					every_trade_node_member_province={
						limit={
							owned_by=ROOT
						}
						if={
							limit={
								ROOT={mil_tech=24}
							}
							if={
								limit={
									NOT={has_building=fort_18th}
								}
								hidden_effect={
									remove_building=fort_15th
									remove_building=fort_16th
									remove_building=fort_17th
								}
								add_building_construction={
									building=fort_18th

								}
							}

							limit={

								}

								}
							}
							if={
								limit={
									NOT={has_building=fort_16th}
								}

									remove_building=fort_15th
								}

FEE_Protestant_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Protestant_Events.1
		title=FEE_Protestant_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Protestant_Events.1.D
		picture=ADVISOR_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				capital_scope={region=scandinavia_region}
				tag=MKL
				tag=POM
				tag=HSA
				tag=EFR
				tag=BRU
				tag=SHL
				tag=BRE
			}
			NOT={is_year=1560}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_prot_johannes_bugenhagen}
			religion=protestant
			any_province={religion=catholic}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=480
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				ADM=4
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				has_idea_group=humanist_ideas
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_prot_johannes_bugenhagen
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Protestant_Events.1.OPT1
			define_advisor={
				type=inquisitor
				name="Johannes Bugenhagen"
				skill=2
				discount=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Protestant_Events.1.OPT2
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	}
	
	province_event={
		id=FEE_Protestant_Events.2
		title=FEE_Protestant_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Protestant_Events.2.D
		picture=RELIGION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			religion=catholic
			is_religion_enabled=protestant
			NOT={is_year=1650}
			NOT={
				owner={
					OR={
						religion=catholic
						religion=reformed
						religion=protestant
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=720
			modifier={
				factor=0.9
				owner={
					has_idea_group=humanist_ideas
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.1
				owner={
					has_idea_group=religious_ideas
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Protestant_Events.2.OPT1
	
			change_religion=protestant
		}
	}

				NOT={
					any_neighbor_country={

FEE_Russian_Minors_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.1
		title=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=RYA
				tag=YAR
				tag=PSK
				tag=TVE
			}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_russian_minors_veche_flag}
			NOT={adm_tech=16}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_russian_minors_veche_flag
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_nov_administrative_focus_veche
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.1.OPT2
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_nov_diplomatic_focus_veche
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.1.OPT3
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_nov_military_focus_veche
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.1.OPT4
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_nov_no_focus_veche
				duration=3650
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.2
		title=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.2.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=TVE
				tag=RYA
				tag=PSK
			}
			is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_russian_minors_lithuanian_protection}
			LIT={
				is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
				NOT={alliance_with=ROOT}
			}
			NOT={num_of_cities=5}
			any_neighbor_country={
				tag=MOS
			}
			is_year=1450
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=300
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_russian_minors_lithuanian_protection
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.2.OPT1
	
			add_mil_power=25
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.2.OPT2
	
			add_years_of_income=-1
			if={
				limit={
					LIT={
						ai=yes
					}
				}
				create_alliance=LIT
			}
			if={
				limit={
					LIT={
						ai=no
					}
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.3
					days=5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.3
		title=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.3.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.3.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
				modifier={
					factor=0
					NOT={num_of_free_diplomatic_relations=0}
				}
			}
	
			create_alliance=FROM
			add_years_of_income=0.5
			add_dip_power=10
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russian_Minors_Events.3.OPT2
	
			FROM={
				add_years_of_income=1
			}
			add_adm_power=25
		}
	}
}
FEE_Russia_Events={
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Russia_Events.1
		title=FEE_Russia_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Russia_Events.1.D
		picture=CITY_VIEW_eventPicture
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=300
		}
	
		trigger={
			tag=RUS
			has_country_flag=relocated_capital_st_petersburg
			owns=295
			owns=33
			33={
				is_capital=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russia_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={factor=70}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.75
			33={
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_shipyard_building_trigger=yes}
					}
					add_building=grand_shipyard
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							has_building=grand_shipyard
						}
						has_building=shipyard
					}
					remove_building=shipyard
					add_building=grand_shipyard
				}
				else={
					add_base_production=1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_building=coastal_defence}
						NOT={has_building=naval_battery}
					}
					add_building=naval_battery
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={
							has_building=naval_battery
						}
						has_building=coastal_defence
					}
					remove_building=coastal_defence
					add_building=naval_battery
				}
				else={
					add_base_tax=1
				}
				if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_building=fort_15th}
					}
					add_building=fort_15th
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_building=fort_16th}
					}
					add_building=fort_16th
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_building=fort_17th}
					}
					add_building=fort_17th
				}
				else_if={
					limit={
						NOT={has_building=fort_18th}
					}
					add_building=fort_18th
				}
				else={
					add_base_manpower=1
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_rus_kronstadt_fortress
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Russia_Events.1.OPT2
			ai_chance={factor=30}
	
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
			295={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_rus_renovated_kremlin
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Russia_Events.2
		title=FEE_Russia_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Russia_Events.2.D
		picture=COURT_eventPicture

			months=1

			}

				add_province_modifier={

			ai_chance={factor=30}

			}
			bothnia_area={
				cede_province=FIN
			}

				cede_province=FIN
			}
			4124={
				cede_province=FIN
			}

				cede_province=FIN
			}

					name=fee_rus_sisu

						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.8
							cavalry=0.1
							artillery=0.1
						}
					}
					change_primary_culture=finnish
					change_religion=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	
		after={
			hidden_effect={
				finland_area={
					change_culture=finnish
					add_core=FIN
				}
				bothnia_area={
					change_culture=finnish
					add_core=FIN
				}
				4151={
					change_culture=finnish
					add_core=FIN
				}
				4124={
					change_culture=finnish
					add_core=FIN
				}
				32={
					change_culture=finnish
					add_core=FIN
				}
				30={
					change_culture=finnish
					add_core=FIN
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
FEE_Savoy_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Savoy_Events.1
		title=FEE_Savoy_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Savoy_Events.1.D
		picture=MILITARY_CAMP_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=SAV
				tag=SPI
			}
			is_year=1560
			NOT={is_year=1600}
			is_free_or_tributary_trigger=yes
			OR={
				mil=3
				advisor=army_reformer
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=240
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				mil=4
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.9
				NOT={
					num_of_mercenaries=1
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				has_idea_group=administrative_ideas
			}
		}
	
		option={		# We need a standing army.
			name=FEE_Savoy_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_savoy_army
				duration=10950
			}
		}
	
		option={		#mercenaries are our greatest strength
			name=FEE_Savoy_Events.1.OPT2

				name=fee_savoy_mercenaries
				duration=10950
			}
		}
	}

				factor=0.9
				mil=4
			}

				factor=0.5
				truce_with=FRA
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.5
				war_with=FRA
			}
		}
	
		option={		# The glory days of Savoy are yet to come
			name=FEE_Savoy_Events.2.OPT1
	
			add_adm_power=25
			add_dip_power=25
			add_mil_power=25
		}
	
		option={		# Our army is the source of our might
			name=FEE_Savoy_Events.2.OPT2
	
			add_army_tradition=10
			add_mil_power=50
			add_adm_power=10
			add_dip_power=10
		}

		id=FEE_Savoy_Events.3

		desc=FEE_Savoy_Events.3.D

			}

					alliance_with=SPA
				}
			}

					change_religion=ROOT

FEE_Scotland_Events={
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Scotland_Events.1
		title=FEE_Scotland_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Scotland_Events.1.D
		picture=PAINTER_ARTIST_eventPicture
		trigger={
			tag=SCO
			is_year=1450
			is_institution_enabled=renaissance
		}
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
		}
		fire_only_once=yes
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.1.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_Scotland_compulsory_education
				duration=-1
			}
			change_innovativeness=5
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_nobles
				loyalty=-15
			}
			if={
				limit={
					owns_core_province=251
				}
				251={
					add_institution_embracement={
						which=renaissance
						value=100
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				capital_scope={
					add_institution_embracement={
						which=renaissance
						value=100
					}
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income=-0.5
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.1.OPT2
			change_innovativeness=3
			if={
				limit={
					owns_core_province=251
				}
				251={
					add_institution_embracement={
						which=renaissance
						value=50
					}
				}
			}
			else={
				capital_scope={
					add_institution_embracement={
						which=renaissance
						value=50
					}
				}
			}
			add_years_of_income=-0.25
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.1.OPT3
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_Scotland_education_stifled
				duration=7300
			}
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			change_innovativeness=-5
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_nobles
				loyalty=10
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Scotland_Events.2
		title=FEE_Scotland_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Scotland_Events.2.D
		picture=TOURNAMENT_eventPicture
		trigger={
			tag=SCO
			has_regency=no
			ENG={
				NOT={
					calc_true_if={
						france_region={
							country_or_non_sovereign_subject_holds=ENG
						}
						amount=3
					}
				}
				OR={
					has_country_flag=war_of_the_roses_ended
					mission_completed=eng_rb_war_of_roses
				}
			}
			is_year=1450
			NOT={
				is_year=1550
			}
		}
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=60
		}
		fire_only_once=yes
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.2.OPT1
			save_event_target_as=FEE_Scotland_choose_to_marry_france
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={
						marriage_with=FRA
					}
				}
				create_marriage=FRA
			}
			FRA={
				define_consort={
					name="Mary"
					country_of_origin=PREV
					dynasty=PREV
					religion=PREV
					culture=PREV
					adm=3
					dip=0
					mil=3
					female=yes
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=PREV
					modifier=FEE_Scotland_strategic_marriage
				}
				ROOT={
					define_consort={
						name="Marie"
						country_of_origin=PREV
						dynasty=PREV
						religion=PREV
						culture=PREV
						age=23
						adm=6
						dip=6
						mil=3
						female=yes
					}
				}
			}
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
			ENG={
				add_opinion={
					who=PREV
					modifier=FEE_Scotland_marriage_offer_spurned
				}
				add_casus_belli={
					type=cb_restore_personal_union
					target=PREV
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Scotland_Events.3
				}
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.2.OPT2
			save_event_target_as=FEE_Scotland_choose_to_marry_england
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={
						marriage_with=ENG
					}
				}
				create_marriage=ENG
			}
			ENG={

			}
			estate_influence={
				estate=estate_church
				influence=40
			}
			is_year=1590
			OR={
				current_age=age_of_reformation
				current_age=age_of_absolutism
			}
		}
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=240
		}
		fire_only_once=yes
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.16.OPT1
			hidden_effect={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Scotland_Events.17
					days=15
					random=15
				}
			}
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_church
				loyalty=-20
			}
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_nobles
				loyalty=-20
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_Scotland_reigning_in_the_presbyterians
				duration=-1
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.16.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=1
			}
			add_stability=3
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_church
				loyalty=20
			}
			add_estate_loyalty={
				estate=estate_nobles
				loyalty=20
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=FEE_Scotland_presbyterian_freedoms_protected
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Scotland_Events.19
		title=FEE_Scotland_Events.19.T
		desc=FEE_Scotland_Events.19.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
		major=yes
		is_triggered_only=yes
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=FEE_Scotland_scottish_civil_war
				release=HSC
				HSC={
					save_event_target_as=FEE_Scotland_HSC_target
					every_country={
						limit={
							is_rival=event_target_FEE_Scotland_rival_target
						}
						country_event={
							id=FEE_Scotland_Events.20
						}
					}
					capital_scope={
						build_to_forcelimit={
							infantry=0.7
							cavalry=0.2
							artillery=0.1
						}
					}
					define_general={
						name="Archibald Campbell"
						shock=2
						fire=4
						manuever=5
						siege=1
					}
					define_general={
						name="Alexander Leslie"
						shock=3
						fire=5
						manuever=1
						siege=5
					}
					override_country_name=FEE_Scotland_Covenanters
					if={
						limit={
							NOT={
								religion=reformed
							}
						}
						change_religion=reformed
					}
					every_owned_province={
						if={
							limit={
								NOT={
									religion=reformed
								}
							}
							change_religion=reformed
						}
					}
					declare_war_with_cb={
						casus_belli=cb_independence_war
						who=PREV
					}
				}
				every_province={
					limit={
						culture_group=gaelic
					}
					add_core=HSC
				}
			}
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.19.OPT1
			custom_tooltip=FEE_Scotland_Events.19.OPT1.tooltip1
		}
		option={
			name=FEE_Scotland_Events.19.OPT2
			switch_tag=HSC
			custom_tooltip=FEE_Scotland_Events.19.OPT2.tooltip1
			HSC={
				add_country_modifier={
					name=FEE_Scotland_presbyterian_freedoms_protected
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	}

		}
