FEE_Songhai_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Songhai_Events.1
		title=FEE_Songhai_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Songhai_Events.1.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=SON
			is_year=1480
			NOT={is_year=1490}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=100
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Songhai_Events.1.OPT1
	
			define_general={
				name="Muhammad Askia"
				fire=3
				shock=5
				manuever=4
				siege=2
			}
			hidden_effect={
				set_country_flag=fee_son_general_ture
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Songhai_Events.2
		title=FEE_Songhai_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Songhai_Events.2.D
		picture=RELIGIOUS_CONVERSION_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=SON
			NOT={is_year=1510}
			is_year=1485
			religion=sunni
			has_leader="Muhammad Askia"
			is_subject=no
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=360
			modifier={
				factor=0.6
				NOT={
					had_country_flag={
						flag=fee_son_general_ture
						days=7200
					}
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.3
				ADM=5
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.2
				DIP=5
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.2
				MIL=5
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={set_country_flag=askia_dynasty_mission_flag}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Songhai_Events.2.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=85
			}
	
			change_religious_influence_equivalent_fee={add=15}
			add_stability=-1
			define_leader_to_ruler={
				type=general
				name="Askia Muhammad"
				adm=6
				dip=5
				mil=4
				claim=60
				fixed=yes
			}
			kill_heir=yes
			random_owned_province={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=2
					leader="Baru Sonni"
				}
			}
			random_owned_province={
				spawn_rebels={
					type=pretender_rebels
					size=1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Songhai_Events.2.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=15
			}
	
			add_stability=-2
			kill_ruler=yes
			if={
				limit={
					has_heir=no
				}
				define_ruler={
					name="Baru"
					dynasty="Sonni"
					age=15
				}
			}
			change_religion=animism
		}
	}
}
FEE_Swabia_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.1
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.1.D
		picture=LIBERUM_VETO_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			hre_size=1
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swa_swabian_league_established}
			OR={
				capital_scope={
					area=lower_swabia_area
				}
				capital_scope={
					area=upper_swabia_area
				}
			}
			is_year=1460
			NOT={is_year=1520}
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swabian_league_disbanded}
			NOT={is_at_war=yes}
			NOT={tag=BAV}
			is_part_of_hre=yes
			is_subject=no
			NOT={
				num_of_owned_provinces_with={
					value=4
					NOT={area=lower_swabia_area}
					NOT={area=upper_swabia_area}
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=240
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				has_truce=yes
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.1.OPT1		# Establish a league for all of Swabia!
	
			set_global_flag=fee_swa_swabian_league_established
			set_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=10}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.1.OPT2		# We fight on our own.
	
			add_mil_power=10
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.2
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.2.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.2.D
		picture=DIPLOMACY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			hre_size=1
			OR={
				OR={
					capital_scope={area=lower_swabia_area}
					capital_scope={area=upper_swabia_area}
				}
				AND={
					any_neighbor_country={
						OR={
							capital_scope={area=lower_swabia_area}
							capital_scope={area=upper_swabia_area}
						}
					}
					NOT={tag=BAV}
					NOT={tag=SWI}
					is_emperor=no
				}
			}
			has_global_flag=fee_swa_swabian_league_established
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_swa_rejected_swabian_league}
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swabian_league_disbanded}
			is_at_war=no
			is_part_of_hre=yes
			NOT={num_of_cities=6}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=3
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.2.OPT1		# We will join this defensive league.
			ai_chance={
				factor=75
			}
	
			set_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
			every_country={
				limit={
					is_part_of_hre=yes
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.3
					days=30
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.2.OPT2		# We stand alone.
			ai_chance={factor=25}
	
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=5}
			set_country_flag=fee_swa_rejected_swabian_league
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.3
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.3.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.3.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.3.OPT1
	
			add_adm_power=10
			add_mil_power=10
			add_dip_power=10
			add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_swa_league_member
			}
			reverse_add_opinion={
				who=FROM
				modifier=fee_swa_league_member
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.4
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.4.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.4.D
		picture=ACCUSATION_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.4.OPT1
			every_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
				remove_opinion={
					who=FROM
					modifier=fee_swa_league_member
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion={
					who=FROM
					modifier=fee_swa_league_member
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.5
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.5.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.5.D
		picture=ACCUSATION_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
			any_country={
				has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				defensive_war_with=ROOT
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			days=600
			modifier={
				factor=1.5
				any_country={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					has_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						value=150
					}
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.6
				any_country={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					NOT={
						has_opinion={
							who=ROOT
							value=0
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	
		immediate={
			clr_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
			set_country_flag=fee_swa_rejected_swabian_league
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.5.OPT1
			every_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
				reverse_remove_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=fee_swa_league_member
				}
			}
			every_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.4
					days=3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.6
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.6.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.6.D

					days=1
				}
			}

				limit={
					any_neighbor_country={has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league}
					NOT={has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league}
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.20
					days=7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.7
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.7.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.7.D

		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.10
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.10.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.10.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swabian_league_disbanded}
			any_country={
				NOT={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
				offensive_war_with=ROOT
			}
			OR={
				NOT={has_country_flag=fee_swa_league_aid}
				had_country_flag={
					flag=fee_swa_league_aid
					days=3650
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
			modifier={
				factor=0.75
					any_country={
						war_score_against={
							who=ROOT
							value=10
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				clr_country_flag=fee_swa_league_aid
				set_country_flag=fee_swa_league_aid
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.10.OPT1
	
			every_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					NOT={is_at_war=yes}
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.11
					days=3
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.10.OPT2
	
			add_years_of_income=0.25
			add_manpower=0.5
			add_prestige=1
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.11
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.11.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.11.D
		picture=COUNTRY_COLLAPSE_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
		}
	
		option={				# Send military aid
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.11.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=35
				modifier={
					factor=0
					NOT={manpower=1000}
				}
			}
	
			add_manpower=-1
			FROM={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.12 days=1
					random=45
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={				# Send financial aid
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.11.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=35
				modifier={
					factor=0
					NOT={treasury=20}
				}
			}
	
			add_treasury=-25
			FROM={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.13 days=1
					random=45
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={				# All aid we can muster
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.11.OPT3
			ai_chance={factor=20}
	
			add_treasury=-25
			add_manpower=-1
			FROM={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.14 days=1
					random=45
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={				# No aid
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.11.OPT4
			ai_chance={
				factor=10
				modifier={
					factor=100
					NOT={manpower=1000}
					NOT={treasury=20}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=75
					any_country={
						alliance_with=ROOT
						offensive_war_with=FROM
					}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=60
					NOT={
						has_opinion={
							who=FROM
							value=0
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_prestige=-10
			FROM={
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.15 days=1
					random=45
				}
			}
		}
	}

		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.16
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.16.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.16.D
		picture=LAND_MILITARY_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
			is_at_war=no
			calc_true_if={
				amount=3
				all_country={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					NOT={
						had_recent_war=10
					}
				}
			}
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swabian_league_disbanded}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=160
			modifier={
				factor=0.75
				any_country={
					alliance_with=ROOT
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.75
				calc_true_if={
					all_country={
						alliance_with=ROOT
						has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					}
					amount=2
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.75
				calc_true_if={
					all_country={
						alliance_with=ROOT
						has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					}
					amount=3
				}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=1.25
				any_country={
						has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
						is_rival=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={		# And with the league, our country is safe
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.16.OPT1
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
		}
	
		option={		# This is a golden age for Swabia!
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.16.OPT2
	
			add_adm_power=25
			add_dip_power=25
			add_mil_power=25
		}
	
		option={		# Let's make sure we collect our League taxes.
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.16.OPT3
	
			add_treasury=25
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.17
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.17.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.17.D
		picture=DEBATE_REPUBLICAN_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=SWI
			has_global_flag=fee_swa_swabian_league_established
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swa_swabian_league_established}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league}
			NOT={is_at_war=yes}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=160
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				any_country={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					truce_with=SWI
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={		# Develop a strategic defense plan
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.17.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
				modifier={
					factor=80
					calc_true_if={
						NOT={
							any_country={
								has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
								reverse_has_opinion={
									who=ROOT
									value=25
								}
							}
						}
						amount=2
					}
				}
			}
			add_mil_power=50
		}
	
		option={		# There is safety in reconciliation
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.17.OPT2
			ai_chance={factor=50}
			every_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=SWI
					modifier=fee_swa_swabian_reconciliation
				}
			}
			add_dip_power=10
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.18
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.18.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.18.D
		picture=CONQUEST_eventPicture
	
		trigger={
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league}
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_rejected_swabian_league}
			is_part_of_hre=yes
			has_global_flag=fee_swa_swabian_league_established
			OR={
				capital_scope={area=lower_swabia_area}
				capital_scope={area=upper_swabia_area}
			}
			is_at_war=no
			is_subject=no
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swabian_league_disbanded}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=20
			modifier={
				factor=0.6
				calc_true_if={
					all_country={
						has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
						has_opinion={
							who=ROOT
							value=100
						}
					}
					amount=2
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.18.OPT1		# We will join this defensive league.
			ai_chance={
				factor=90
			}
	
			set_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
			every_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
				country_event={
					id=FEE_Swabia_Events.3
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.18.OPT2		# We stand alone.
			ai_chance={factor=10}
	
			set_country_flag=fee_rejected_swabian_league
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.19
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.19.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.19.D
		picture=MILITARY_CAMP_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=BAV
			any_neighbor_country={
				has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				NOT={
					has_opinion={
						who=ROOT
						value=0
					}
				}
			}
			NOT={has_global_flag=fee_swabian_league_disbanded}
			has_global_flag=fee_swa_swabian_league_established
			NOT={has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=160
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				any_neighbor_country={has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league}
				any_owned_province={is_claim=PREV}
			}
			modifier={
				factor=0.8
				any_country={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
					truce_with=ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.19.OPT1	# I don't care. We will crush them!
			ai_chance={factor=75}
	
			add_mil_power=50
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.19.OPT2	# Maybe it is time for a more... diplomatic solution.
			ai_chance={factor=25}
	
			every_country={
				limit={
					has_country_flag=fee_swa_member_swabia_league
				}
				add_opinion={
					who=BAV
					modifier=fee_swa_swabian_reconciliation
				}
			}
			set_country_flag=fee_swa_swabian_reconciliation
		}
	}
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Swabia_Events.20
		title=FEE_Swabia_Events.20.T
		desc=FEE_Swabia_Events.20.D
		picture=CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	
		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Swabia_Events.20.OPT1
		}
	}
}
FEE_Switzerland_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Switzerland_Events.1
		title=FEE_Switzerland_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Switzerland_Events.1.D
		picture=BATTLE_eventPicture

		is_triggered_only=yes
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Switzerland_Events.20.OPT1
	
			if={
				limit={
					NOT={religion=catholic}
				}
				change_religion=catholic
			}
			add_country_modifier={
				name=fee_swi_church_won_debate
				duration=9125
			}
			1869={
				if={
					limit={
						owned_by=ROOT
						NOT={religion=catholic}
					}
					change_religion=catholic
				}
				if={
					limit={
						is_reformation_center=yes
					}
					remove_reform_center=reformed
					remove_reform_center=protestant
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_swi_catholicism_enshrined
					duration=18250
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

				add_province_modifier={
					name=local_fortress
					duration=18250
				}
			}
		}
	}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Venice_Events.94
		title=FEE_Venice_Events.94.T
		desc=FEE_Venice_Events.94.D
		picture=MERCHANTS_TALKING_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			is_year=1508
			owns=205
			any_country={
				has_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant
			}
			NOT={is_year=1515}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			years=1
		}
	
		major=yes
		major_trigger={
			has_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant
		}
	
		goto=205
	
		immediate={
			hidden_effect={
				random_country={
					limit={has_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant}
					set_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant_savoy
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Venice_Events.94.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_treasury=-25
			205={
				add_base_production=1
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant
					duration=5475
				}
				random_country={
					limit={has_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant}
					PREV={
						add_trade_modifier={
							who=PREV
							duration=5475
							power=10
							key=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_country={
				limit={has_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=opinion_export_good
				}
				reverse_add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=opinion_export_good
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Venice_Events.94.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
				modifier={
					factor=2
					NOT={treasury=25}
				}
				modifier={
					factor=2
					any_country={
						has_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant
						NOT={
							has_opinion={
								who=ROOT
								value=50
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
			add_mil_power=25
			add_mercantilism=3
			random_country={
				limit={has_country_flag=fee_ven_francesco_venier_merchant}
				add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=opinion_export_bad
				}
				reverse_add_opinion={
					who=ROOT
					modifier=opinion_export_bad
				}
			}
		}
	}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Venice_Events.98
		title=FEE_Venice_Events.98.T
		desc=FEE_Venice_Events.98.D
		picture=TOURNAMENT_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			OR={
				tag=VEN
				was_tag=VEN
			}
			is_year=1528
			NOT={is_year=1530}
			any_owned_province={
				OR={
					culture=dalmatian
					area=east_adriatic_coast_area
				}
			}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=6
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Venice_Events.98.OPT1
			ai_chance={
				factor=50
			}
	
			add_treasury=-50
			add_mil_power=-50
			add_country_modifier={
				name=cavalry_companions
				duration=-1
			}
			random_owned_province={
				limit={
					OR={
						culture=dalmatian
						area=east_adriatic_coast_area
					}
				}
				if={
					limit={has_building=conscription_center}
					add_base_manpower=1
				}
				else_if={
					limit={has_building=regimental_camp}
					add_building=conscription_center
				}
				else={
					add_building=regimental_camp
				}
				if={
					limit={has_building=training_fields}
					add_base_manpower=1
				}
				else_if={
					limit={has_building=barracks}
					add_building=training_fields
				}
				else={
					add_building=barracks
				}
				add_province_modifier={
					name=military_reinforcement
					duration=-1
				}
			}
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Venice_Events.98.OPT2
			ai_chance={
				factor=25
				modifier={
					factor=2
					NOT={treasury=50}
				}
			}
	
			add_army_tradition=-5
		}
	}

FEE_Vijayanagar_Events={
	
	country_event={
		id=FEE_Vijayanagar_Events.1
		title=FEE_Vijayanagar_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Vijayanagar_Events.1.D
		picture=GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=VIJ
			has_ruler="Devaraya II"
			NOT={	adm=5}
			religion=hinduism
			primary_culture=kannada
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=12
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Vijayanagar_Events.1.OPT1	#What a fine king he is!
	
			add_stability_or_adm_power=yes
			add_prestige_or_monarch_power={amount=20}
			change_adm=1
			add_ruler_modifier={
				name=vij_devaraya_literature
				duration=-1
			}
		}
	}
}

	country_event={
		id=FEE_Wurzburg_Events.1
		title=FEE_Wurzburg_Events.1.T
		desc=FEE_Wurzburg_Events.1.D
		picture=GREAT_BUILDING_eventPicture
	
		fire_only_once=yes
	
		trigger={
			tag=WBG
			owns=79
			is_year=1570
			NOT={is_year=1600}
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen={
			months=144
		}
	
		option={
			name=FEE_Wurzburg_Events.1.OPT1
	
			add_adm_power=50
			79={
				add_province_modifier={
					name=fee_university_wurzburg
					duration=18250

			}
		}
	}
